name: Forward
desc: Returns a normal vector facing in the direction that the angle points.

name: IsZero
desc: Returns whether the pitch, yaw and roll are 0 or not.

name: Normalize
desc: Normalizes the angles by applying a module with 360 to pitch, yaw and roll.

name: Right
desc: Returns a normal vector facing in the direction that points right relative to the angle's direction.

name: RotateAroundAxis
desc: Rotates the angle around the specified axis by the specified degrees.

name: Set
desc: Copies pitch, yaw and roll from the second angle to the first.

name: SnapTo
desc: Snaps the angle to nearest interval of degrees.

name: Up
desc: Returns a normal vector facing in the direction that points up relative to the angle's direction.

name: Zero
desc: Sets pitch, yaw and roll to 0.

name: ReadAngle
desc: Reads an returns an angle object from the bitstream.

name: ReadBool
desc: Reads 1 bit an returns a bool representing the bit.

name: ReadChar
desc: Reads a signed char and returns a number from -127 to 127 representing the ascii value of that char.

name: ReadEntity
desc: Reads a short representing an entity index and returns the matching entity handle.

name: ReadFloat
desc: Reads a 4 byte float from the bitstream and returns it.

name: ReadLong
desc: Reads a 4 byte long from the bitstream and returns it.

name: ReadShort
desc: Reads a 2 byte short from the bitstream and returns it.

name: ReadString
desc: Reads a null terminated string from the bitstream.

name: ReadVector
desc: Reads a special encoded vector from the bitstream and returns it, this function is not suitable to send normals.

name: ReadVectorNormal
desc: Reads a special encoded vector normal from the bitstream and returns it, this function is not suitable to send vectors that represent a position.

name: Reset
desc: Rewinds the bitstream so it can be read again.

name: GetAngles
desc: Returns the angles of the effect.

name: GetAttachment
desc: Returns the attachment ID for the effect.

name: GetColor
desc: Returns byte which represents the color of the effect.

name: GetDamageType
desc: Returns the damage type of the effect

name: GetEntIndex
desc: Returns the entity index of the entity set for the effect.

name: GetEntity
desc: Returns the entity assigned to the effect.

name: GetFlags
desc: Returns the flags of the effect.

name: GetHitBox
desc: Returns the hit box ID of the effect.

name: GetMagnitude
desc: Returns the magnitude of the effect.

name: GetMaterialIndex
desc: Returns the material ID of the effect.

name: GetNormal
desc: Returns the normalized direction vector of the effect.

name: GetOrigin
desc: Returns the origin position of the effect.

name: GetRadius
desc: Returns the radius of the effect.

name: GetScale
desc: Returns the scale of the effect.

name: GetStart
desc: Returns the start position of the effect.

name: GetSurfaceProp
desc: Returns the surface property index of the effect.

name: SetAngles
desc: Sets the angles of the effect.

name: SetAttachment
desc: Sets the attachment id of the effect to be created with this effect data.

name: SetColor
desc: Sets the color of the effect.

name: SetDamageType
desc: Sets the damage type of the effect to be created with this effect data.

name: SetEntIndex
desc: Sets the entity of the effect via its index.

name: SetEntity
desc: Sets the entity of the effect to be created with this effect data.

name: SetFlags
desc: Sets the flags of the effect.

name: SetHitBox
desc: Sets the hit box index of the effect.

name: SetMagnitude
desc: Sets the magnitude of the effect.

name: SetMaterialIndex
desc: Sets the material index of the effect.

name: SetNormal
desc: Sets the normalized direction vector of the effect to be created with this effect data.

name: SetOrigin
desc: Sets the origin of the effect to be created with this effect data.

name: SetRadius
desc: Sets the radius of the effect to be created with this effect data.

name: SetScale
desc: Sets the scale of the effect to be created with this effect data.

name: SetStart
desc: Sets the start of the effect to be created with this effect data.

name: SetSurfaceProp
desc: Sets the surface property index of the effect.

name: Add
desc: Creates a new CLuaParticle with the given material and position.

name: Draw
desc: Manually renders all particles the emitter has created.

name: Finish
desc: Removes the emitter and all its particles.

name: GetNumActiveParticles
desc: Returns the amount of active particles of this emitter.

name: GetPos
desc: Returns the position of this emitter. This is set when creating the emitter with {{GlobalFunction|ParticleEmitter}}.

name: Is3D
desc: Returns whether this emitter is 3D or not. This is set when creating the emitter with {{GlobalFunction|ParticleEmitter}}.

name: SetBBox
desc: Sets the bounding box for this emitter.

name: SetNearClip
desc: This function sets the the distance between the render camera and the emitter at which the particles should start fading and at which distance fade ends ( alpha becomes 0 ).

name: SetNoDraw
desc: Prevents all particles of the emitter from automatically drawing.

name: SetParticleCullRadius
desc: The function name has not much in common with its actual function, it applies a radius to every particles that affects the building of the bounding box, as it, usually is constructed by the particle that has the lowest x, y and z and the highest x, y and z, this function just adds/subtracts the radius and inflates the bounding box.

name: SetPos
desc: Sets the position of the particle emitter.

name: Approach
desc: Sets the location we want to get to

name: ClearStuck
desc: Removes the stuck status from the bot

name: FaceTowards
desc: Sets the direction we want to face

name: GetAcceleration
desc: Returns the acceleration speed

name: GetCurrentAcceleration
desc: Returns the current acceleration as a vector

name: GetDeathDropHeight
desc: Gets the height the bot is scared to fall from

name: GetDeceleration
desc: Gets the deceleration speed

name: GetGroundMotionVector
desc: Return unit vector in XY plane describing our direction of motion - even if we are currently not moving

name: GetJumpHeight
desc: Gets the height of the bot's jump

name: GetMaxJumpHeight
desc: Returns maximum jump height of this CLuaLocomotion.

name: GetMaxYawRate
desc: Returns the max rate at which the NextBot can visually rotate.

name: GetStepHeight
desc: Gets the max height the bot can step up

name: GetVelocity
desc: Returns the current movement velocity as a vector

name: IsAreaTraversable
desc: Returns whether this CLuaLocomotion}} can reach and/or traverse/move in given {{Type|CNavArea.

name: IsAttemptingToMove
desc: Returns true if we're trying to move.

name: IsClimbingOrJumping
desc: Returns true of the locomotion engine is jumping or climbing

name: IsOnGround
desc: Returns whether the locomotion/nextbot is on ground or not.

name: IsStuck
desc: Returns true if we're stuck

name: Jump
desc: Makes the bot jump

name: SetAcceleration
desc: Sets the acceleration speed

name: SetDeathDropHeight
desc: Sets the height the bot is scared to fall from.

name: SetDeceleration
desc: Sets the deceleration speed.

name: SetDesiredSpeed
desc: Sets movement speed.

name: SetJumpHeight
desc: Sets the height of the bot's jump

name: SetMaxYawRate
desc: Sets the max rate at which the NextBot can visually rotate. This will not affect moving or pathing.

name: SetStepHeight
desc: Sets the max height the bot can step up

name: SetVelocity
desc: Sets the current movement velocity

name: GetAirResistance
desc: Returns the air resistance of the particle.

name: GetAngleVelocity
desc: Returns the angular velocity of the particle

name: GetBounce
desc: Returns the 'bounciness' of the particle.

name: GetDieTime
desc: Returns the amount of time in seconds after which the particle will be destroyed.

name: GetEndAlpha
desc: Returns the alpha value that the particle will reach on its death.

name: GetEndLength
desc: Returns the length that the particle will reach on its death.

name: GetEndSize
desc: Returns the size that the particle will reach on its death.

name: GetGravity
desc: Returns the gravity of the particle.

name: GetLifeTime
desc: Returns the 'life time' of the particle, how long the particle existed since its creation.

name: GetRoll
desc: Returns the current rotation of the particle in radians, this should only be used for 2D particles.

name: GetRollDelta
desc: Returns the current rotation speed of the particle in radians, this should only be used for 2D particles.

name: GetStartAlpha
desc: Returns the alpha value which the particle has when it's created.

name: GetStartLength
desc: Returns the length which the particle has when it's created.

name: GetStartSize
desc: Returns the size which the particle has when it's created.

name: SetAirResistance
desc: Sets the air resistance of the the particle.

name: SetAngleVelocity
desc: Sets the angular velocity of the the particle.

name: SetBounce
desc: Sets the 'bounciness' of the the particle.

name: SetCollide
desc: Sets the whether the particle should collide with the world or not.

name: SetCollideCallback
desc: Sets the function that gets called whenever the particle collides with the world.

name: SetColor
desc: Sets the color of the particle.

name: SetDieTime
desc: Sets the time where the particle will be removed.

name: SetEndAlpha
desc: Sets the alpha value of the particle that it will reach when it dies.

name: SetEndLength
desc: Sets the length of the particle that it will reach when it dies.

name: SetEndSize
desc: Sets the size of the particle that it will reach when it dies.

name: SetGravity
desc: Sets the directional gravity aka. acceleration of the particle.

name: SetLifeTime
desc: Sets the 'life time' of the particle, how long the particle existed since its creation.

name: SetLighting
desc: Sets whether the particle should be lighted.

name: SetNextThink
desc: Sets when the particles think function should be called next, this uses the synchronized server time returned by {{GlobalFunction|CurTime}}.

name: SetPos
desc: Sets the absolute position of the particle.

name: SetRoll
desc: Sets the roll of the particle in radians. This should only be used for 2D particles.

name: SetRollDelta
desc: Sets the rotation speed of the particle in radians. This should only be used for 2D particles.

name: SetStartAlpha
desc: Sets the initial alpha value of the particle.

name: SetStartLength
desc: Sets the initial length value of the particle.

name: SetStartSize
desc: Sets the initial size value of the particle.

name: SetThinkFunction
desc: Sets the think function of the particle.

name: SetVelocity
desc: Sets the velocity of the particle.

name: SetVelocityScale
desc: Scales the velocity based on the particle speed.

name: AddKey
desc: Adds keys to the move data, as if player pressed them.

name: GetAbsMoveAngles
desc: Gets the aim angle. Seems to be same as {{ClassFunction|CMoveData|GetAngles}}.

name: GetButtons
desc: Gets which buttons are down

name: GetConstraintRadius
desc: Returns the radius that constrains the players movement.

name: GetForwardSpeed
desc: Returns the players forward speed.

name: GetImpulseCommand
desc: Gets the number passed to "impulse" console command

name: GetMaxClientSpeed
desc: Returns the maximum client speed of the player

name: GetMaxSpeed
desc: Returns the maximum speed of the player.

name: GetMoveAngles
desc: Returns the angle the player is moving at. For more info, see {{ClassFunction|CMoveData|SetMoveAngles}}.

name: GetOldAngles
desc: Gets the aim angle. Only works clientside, server returns same as {{ClassFunction|CMoveData|GetAngles}}.

name: GetOldButtons
desc: Get which buttons were down last frame

name: GetSideSpeed
desc: Returns the strafe speed of the player.

name: GetUpSpeed
desc: Returns the vertical speed of the player. ( Z axis of {{ClassFunction|CMoveData|GetVelocity}} )

name: KeyDown
desc: Returns whether the key is down or not

name: KeyPressed
desc: Returns whether the key was pressed. If you want to check if the key is held down, try {{ClassFunction|CMoveData|KeyDown}}

name: KeyReleased
desc: Returns whether the key was released

name: KeyWasDown
desc: Returns whether the key was down or not.

name: SetAbsMoveAngles
desc: Sets absolute move angles.( ? ) Doesn't seem to do anything.

name: SetButtons
desc: Sets the pressed buttons on the move data

name: SetConstraintRadius
desc: Sets the radius that constrains the players movement.

name: SetForwardSpeed
desc: Sets players forward speed.

name: SetImpulseCommand
desc: Sets the impulse command. Seems to be broken.

name: SetMaxClientSpeed
desc: Sets the maximum player speed. Player won't be able to run or sprint faster then this value.

name: SetMaxSpeed
desc: Sets the maximum speed of the player. This must match with {{ClassFunction|CMoveData|SetMaxClientSpeed}} both, on server and client.

name: SetMoveAngles
desc: Sets the serverside move angles. Means movement keys will act as if player was facing that direction.

name: SetOldAngles
desc: Sets old aim angles. ( ? ) Doesn't seem to be doing anything.

name: SetOldButtons
desc: Sets the 'old' pressed buttons on the move data. These buttons are used to work out which buttons have been released, which have just been pressed and which are being held down.

name: SetOrigin
desc: Sets the players position.

name: SetSideSpeed
desc: Sets players strafe speed.

name: SetUpSpeed
desc: Sets vertical speed of the player. ( Z axis of {{ClassFunction|CMoveData|SetVelocity}} )

name: AddToClosedList
desc: Adds this CNavArea}} to the list of positions that have been checked by {{Type|NextBot's A* search algorithm.

name: ComputeAdjacentConnectionHeightChange
desc: Returns the height difference between the edges of two connected navareas.

name: ComputeDirection
desc: Returns the {{Enum|NavDir}} direction that the given vector faces on this CNavArea.

name: ComputeGroundHeightChange
desc: Returns the height difference on the Z axis of the two CNavArea}}s. This is calculated from the center most point on both {{Type|CNavAreas.

name: Contains
desc: Returns true if this CNavArea contains the given vector.

name: DrawSpots
desc: Draws the hiding spots on debug overlay. This includes sniper/exposed spots too!

name: GetAdjacentAreas
desc: Returns a table of all the CNavArea}}s that have a ( one and two way ) connection '''from''' this {{Type|CNavArea.

name: GetAdjacentAreasAtSide
desc: Returns a table of all the CNavArea}}s that have a ( one and two way ) connection '''from''' this {{Type|CNavArea in given direction.

name: GetAdjacentCount
desc: Returns the amount of CNavArea}}s that have a connection ( one and two way ) '''from''' this {{Type|CNavArea.

name: GetAdjacentCountAtSide
desc: Returns the amount of CNavArea}}s that have a connection ( one or two way ) '''from''' this {{Type|CNavArea in given direction.

name: GetAttributes
desc: Returns the attribute mask for the given CNavArea.

name: GetCenter
desc: Returns the center most vector point for the given CNavArea.

name: GetClosestPointOnArea
desc: Returns the closest point of this Nav Area from the given position.

name: GetCorner
desc: Returns the vector position of the corner for the given CNavArea.

name: GetCostSoFar
desc: Internal function used when generating a path from one point to another in {{ClassFunction|PathFollower|Compute}}.

name: GetExposedSpots
desc: Returns a table of very bad hiding spots in this area

name: GetHidingSpots
desc: Returns a table of good hiding spots in this area

name: GetID
desc: Returns this CNavAreas unique ID.

name: GetIncomingConnections
desc: Returns a table of all the CNavArea}}s that have a one-way connection '''to''' this {{Type|CNavArea.

name: GetIncomingConnectionsAtSide
desc: Returns a table of all the CNavArea}}s that have a one-way connection '''to''' this {{Type|CNavArea from given direction.

name: GetLadders
desc: Returns all CNavLadder}}s that have a ( one or two way ) connection '''from''' this {{Type|CNavArea.

name: GetLaddersAtSide
desc: Returns all CNavLadder}}s that have a ( one or two way ) connection '''from''' ( one and two way ) this {{Type|CNavArea in given direction.

name: GetParent
desc: Returns the parent CNavArea

name: GetParentHow
desc: Returns how this CNavArea is connected to its parent.

name: GetRandomAdjacentAreaAtSide
desc: Returns a random CNavArea}} that has an outgoing ( one or two way ) connection '''from''' this {{Type|CNavArea in given direction.

name: GetRandomPoint
desc: Returns a random point on the nav area.

name: GetSizeX
desc: Returns the width this Nav Area.

name: GetSizeY
desc: Returns the height of this Nav Area.

name: GetZ
desc: Returns the elevation of this Nav Area at the given position.

name: HasAttributes
desc: Returns true if the given CNavArea has this attribute flag set.

name: IsConnected
desc: Returns whether this CNavArea}} has an outgoing ( one or two way ) connection '''to''' given {{Type|CNavArea.

name: IsConnectedAtSide
desc: Returns whether this CNavArea}} has an outgoing ( one or two way ) connection '''to''' given {{Type|CNavArea in given direction.

name: IsCoplanar
desc: Returns whether this Nav Area is in the same plane as the given one.

name: IsFlat
desc: Returns if this Nav Area is flat within the tolerance of the nav_coplanar_slope_limit_displacement and nav_coplanar_slope_limit convars.

name: IsOverlapping
desc: Returns if this position overlaps the Nav Area within the given tolerance.

name: IsOverlappingArea
desc: Returns true if this CNavArea}} is overlapping the given {{Type|CNavArea.

name: IsRoughlySquare
desc: Returns if we're shaped like a square.

name: IsUnderwater
desc: Whether this Nav Area is placed underwater.

name: IsValid
desc: Returns whether this CNavArea is valid or not.

name: IsVisible
desc: Returns whether we can be seen from the given position.

name: SetAttributes
desc: Sets the attributes for given CNavArea.

name: SetParent
desc: Sets the new parent of this CNavArea.

name: GetBottomArea
desc: Returns the bottom area of the CNavLadder.

name: GetLength
desc: Returns the length of the ladder.

name: GetTopBehindArea
desc: Returns the top behind CNavArea}} of the {{Type|CNavLadder.

name: GetTopForwardArea
desc: Returns the top forward CNavArea}} of the {{Type|CNavLadder.

name: GetTopLeftArea
desc: Returns the top left CNavArea}} of the {{Type|CNavLadder.

name: GetTopRightArea
desc: Returns the top right CNavArea}} of the {{Type|CNavLadder.

name: SetBottomArea
desc: Sets the bottom area of the CNavLadder.

name: SetTopBehindArea
desc: Sets the top behind area of the CNavLadder.

name: SetTopForwardArea
desc: Sets the top forward area of the CNavLadder.

name: SetTopLeftArea
desc: Sets the top left area of the CNavLadder.

name: SetTopRightArea
desc: Sets the top right area of the CNavLadder.

name: AddControlPoint
snippet: AddControlPoint(${1:number cpID},${2:Entity ent},${3:number partAttachment},${4:number entAttachment=0},${5:Vector offset=Vector( 0, 0, 0 )})
desc: Adds a control point to the particle system.

name: GetEffectName
desc: Returns the name of the particle effect this system is set to emit.

name: GetHighestControlPoint
desc: Returns the highest control point number for given particle system.

name: GetOwner
desc: Returns the owner of the particle system, the entity the particle system is attached to.

name: IsFinished
desc: Returns whether the particle system has finished emitting particles or not.

name: IsViewModelEffect
desc: Returns whether the particle system is intended to be used on a view model?

name: Render
desc: Forces the particle system to render using current rendering context.

name: Restart
desc: Forces the particle system to restart emitting particles.

name: SetControlPoint
desc: Sets a value for given control point.

name: SetControlPointEntity
desc: Essentially makes child control point follow the parent entity.

name: SetControlPointForwardVector
desc: Sets the forward direction for given control point.

name: SetControlPointOrientation
desc: Sets the orientation for given control point.

name: SetControlPointParent
desc: Essentially makes child control point follow the parent control point.

name: SetControlPointRightVector
desc: Sets the right direction for given control point.

name: SetControlPointUpVector
desc: Sets the upward direction for given control point.

name: SetShouldDraw
desc: Forces the particle system to stop automatically rendering.

name: SetSortOrigin
desc: Sets the sort origin for given particle system. This is used as a helper to determine which particles are in front of which.

name: StartEmission
desc: Starts the particle emission.

name: StopEmission
desc: Stops the particle emission.

name: StopEmissionAndDestroyImmediately
desc: Stops particle emission and destroys all particles instantly.

name: GetBool
desc: Tries to convert the current string value of a ConVar to a boolean.

name: GetDefault
desc: Returns the default value of the ConVar

name: GetFloat
desc: Attempts to convert the ConVar value to a float

name: GetHelpText
desc: Returns the help text assigned to that convar.

name: GetInt
desc: Attempts to convert the ConVar value to a integer.

name: GetName
desc: Returns the name of the ConVar.

name: GetString
desc: Returns the current ConVar value as a string.

name: SetBool
desc: Sets a ConVar's value to 1 or 0 based on the input boolean. This can only be ran on ConVars created from within Lua.

name: SetFloat
desc: Sets a ConVar's value to to the input number. This can only be ran on ConVars created from within Lua.

name: SetInt
desc: Sets a ConVar's value to the input number after converting it to an integer. This can only be ran on ConVars created from within Lua.

name: SetString
desc: Sets a ConVar's value to the input string. This can only be ran on ConVars created from within Lua.

name: AddAllPlayers
desc: Adds all players to the recipient filter.

name: AddPAS
desc: Adds all players that are in the same PAS as this position.

name: AddPlayer
desc: Adds a player to the recipient filter

name: AddPVS
desc: Adds all players that are in the same PVS as this position.

name: AddRecipientsByTeam
desc: Adds all players that are on the given team to the filter.

name: GetCount
desc: Returns the number of valid players in the recipient filter.

name: GetPlayers
desc: Returns a table of all valid players currently in the recipient filter.

name: RemoveAllPlayers
desc: Removes all players from the recipient filter.

name: RemovePAS
desc: Removes all players from the filter that are in Potentially Audible Set for given position.

name: RemovePlayer
desc: Removes the player from the recipient filter.

name: RemovePVS
desc: Removes all players that can see this PVS from the recipient filter.

name: RemoveRecipientsByTeam
desc: Removes all players that are on the given team from the filter.

name: RemoveRecipientsNotOnTeam
desc: Removes all players that are not on the given team from the filter.

name: Remove
desc: Removes the clientside entity

name: ChangePitch
desc: Adjust the pitch, alias the speed at which the sound is being played.

name: ChangeVolume
desc: Adjusts the volume of the sound played.

name: FadeOut
desc: Fades out the volume of the sound from the current volume to 0 in the given amount of seconds.

name: GetDSP
desc: Returns the DSP ( Digital Signal Processor ) effect for the sound.

name: GetPitch
desc: Returns the current pitch.

name: GetSoundLevel
desc: Returns the current sound level.

name: GetVolume
desc: Returns the current volume.

name: IsPlaying
desc: Returns whenever the sound is being played.

name: Play
desc: Starts to play the sound.

name: PlayEx
desc: Same as {{ClassFunction|CSoundPatch|Play}} but with 2 extra arguments allowing to set volume and pitch directly.

name: SetDSP
desc: Sets the DSP ( Digital Signal Processor ) effect for the sound. Similar to {{ClassFunction|Player|SetDSP}}

name: SetSoundLevel
desc: Sets the sound level in decibel.

name: Stop
desc: Stops the sound from being played.

name: AddDamage
desc: Increases the damage by damageIncrease.

name: GetAmmoType
desc: Returns the ammo type used by the weapon that inflicted the damage.

name: GetAttacker
desc: Returns the attacker ( character who originated the attack ), for example a player or an NPC that shot the weapon.

name: GetBaseDamage
desc: Returns the initial unmodified by skill level ( {{LibraryFunction|game|GetSkillLevel}} ) damage.

name: GetDamage
desc: Returns the total damage.

name: GetDamageForce
desc: Returns a vector representing the damage force.

name: GetDamagePosition
desc: Returns the position where the damage was or is going to be applied to.

name: GetInflictor
desc: Returns the inflictor of the damage. This is not necessarily a weapon.

name: GetMaxDamage
desc: Returns the maximum damage.

name: GetReportedPosition
desc: Returns the initial, unmodified position where the damage occured.

name: IsBulletDamage
desc: Returns true if the damage was caused by a bullet.

name: IsDamageType
desc: Returns whenever the damageinfo contains the damage type specified.

name: IsExplosionDamage
desc: Returns whenever the damageinfo contains explosion damage.

name: IsFallDamage
desc: Returns whenever the damageinfo contains fall damage.

name: ScaleDamage
desc: Scales the damage by the given value.

name: SetAmmoType
desc: Changes the ammo type used by the weapon that inflicted the damage.

name: SetAttacker
desc: Sets the attacker ( character who originated the attack ) of the damage, for example a player or an NPC.

name: SetDamage
desc: Sets the amount of damage.

name: SetDamageBonus
desc: Adds bonus damage, like {{ClassFunction|CTakeDamageInfo|AddDamage}} does.

name: SetDamageForce
desc: Sets the directional force of the damage.

name: SetDamagePosition
desc: Sets the position of where the damage gets applied to.

name: SetDamageType
desc: Sets the damage type.

name: SetInflictor
desc: Sets the inflictor of the damage for example a weapon.

name: SetMaxDamage
desc: Sets the maximum damage the object can cause.

name: SetReportedPosition
desc: Sets the origin of the damage.

name: SubtractDamage
desc: Subtracts the specified amount from the damage.

name: ClearButtons
desc: Removes all keys from the command. Doesn't prevent movement, see {{ClassFunction|CUserCmd|ClearMovement}} for this.

name: ClearMovement
desc: Clears the movement from the command.

name: CommandNumber
desc: Returns an increasing number representing the index of the user cmd. The value returned is occasionally 0 inside {{HookFunction|GM|CreateMove}}, so it's advised to check for a non-zero value if you wish to get the correct number.

name: GetForwardMove
desc: The speed the client wishes to move forward with, negative if the clients wants to move backwards.

name: GetImpulse
desc: Gets the current impulse from the client, usually 0.

name: GetMouseWheel
desc: Returns the scroll delta as whole number.

name: GetMouseX
desc: Returns the delta of the angular horizontal mouse movement of the player.

name: GetMouseY
desc: Returns the delta of the angular vertical mouse movement of the player.

name: GetSideMove
desc: The speed the client wishes to move sideways with, positive if it wants to move right, negative if it wants to move left.

name: GetUpMove
desc: The speed the client wishes to move up with, negative if the clients wants to move down.

name: GetViewAngles
desc: Gets the direction the player is looking in.

name: IsForced
desc: When players are not sending usercommands to the server (often due to lag), their last usercommand will be executed multiple times as a backup. This function returns true if that is happening.

name: RemoveKey
desc: Removed a key bit from the current key bitflag.

name: SelectWeapon
desc: Forces the associated player to select a weapon.

name: SetForwardMove
desc: Sets speed the client wishes to move forward with, negative if the clients wants to move backwards.

name: SetImpulse
desc: Sets the impulse to be send together with the command.

name: SetMouseWheel
desc: Sets the scroll delta.

name: SetMouseX
desc: Sets the delta of the angular horizontal mouse movement of the player.

name: SetMouseY
desc: Sets the delta of the angular vertical mouse movement of the player.

name: SetSideMove
desc: Sets speed the client wishes to move sidewards with, positive to move right, negative to move left.

name: SetUpMove
desc: Sets speed the client wishes to move upwards with, negative to move down.

name: SetViewAngles
desc: Sets the direction the client wants to move in.

name: TickCount
desc: Returns tick count since joining the server. This will always return 0 for bots.

name: Activate
desc: Activates the entity. This needs to be used on some entities (like constraints) after being spawned.

name: AddCallback
desc: Add a callback function to a specific event. This is used instead of hooks to avoid calling empty functions unnecessarily.

name: AddEffects
desc: Applies an engine effect to an entity.

name: AddEFlags
desc: Adds engine flags.

name: AddFlags
desc: Adds flags to the entity.

name: AddGesture
desc: Adds a gesture animation to the entity and plays it.

name: AddGestureSequence
desc: Adds a gesture animation to the entity and plays it.

name: AddLayeredSequence
desc: Adds a gesture animation to the entity and plays it.

name: AddSolidFlags
desc: Adds solid flag(s) to the entity.

name: AddToMotionController
desc: Adds a PhysObj}}ect to the entity's motion controller so that {{HookFunction|ENTITY|PhysicsSimulate}} will be called for given {{Type|PhysObject as well.

name: AlignAngles
desc: Returns an angle based on the ones inputted that you can use to align an object.

name: BecomeRagdollOnClient
desc: Spawns a clientside ragdoll for the entity, positioning it in place of the original entity, and makes the entity invisible. It doesn't preserve flex values (face posing) as CSRagdolls don't support flex.

name: Blocked
desc: {{Internal}} Dispatches blocked events to this entity's blocked handler. This function is only useful when interacting with entities like func_movelinear.

name: BodyTarget
desc: Returns a centered vector of this entity, NPCs use this internally to aim at their targets.

name: BoneHasFlag
desc: Returns whether the entity's bone has the flag or not.

name: BoneLength
desc: This function takes the boneID and returns the length of it in an unrounded decimal

name: BoundingRadius
desc: Returns the distance between the center of the bounding box and the furthest bounding box corner.

name: CallOnRemove
desc: Causes a specified function to be run if the entity is removed by any means.

name: ClearPoseParameters
desc: Resets all pose parameters such as aim_yaw, aim_pitch and rotation.

name: CollisionRulesChanged
desc: Declares that the collision rules of the entity have changed, and subsequent calls for {{HookFunction|GM|ShouldCollide}} with this entity may return a different value than they did previously.

name: CreatedByMap
desc: Returns whether the entity was created by map or not.

name: CreateParticleEffect
desc: Creates a clientside particle system attached to the entity.

name: CreateShadow
desc: Draws the shadow of an entity.

name: DeleteOnRemove
desc: Whenever the entity is removed, entityToRemove will be removed also.

name: DestroyShadow
desc: Removes the shadow for the entity.

name: DisableMatrix
desc: Disables an active matrix.

name: DispatchTraceAttack
desc: Performs a trace attack.

name: DontDeleteOnRemove
desc: This removes the argument entity from an ent's list of entities to 'delete on remove'

name: DrawModel
desc: Draws the entity or model.

name: DrawShadow
desc: Sets whether an entity's shadow should be drawn.

name: DropToFloor
desc: Move an entity down until it collides with something.

name: DTVar
desc: {{Internal}}

name: EmitSound
snippet: EmitSound(${1:string soundName},${2:number soundLevel=75},${3:number pitchPercent=100},${4:number volume=1},${5:number channel=CHAN_AUTO})
desc: Plays a sound on an entity. If run clientside, the sound will only be heard locally.

name: EnableConstraints
desc: Toggles the constraints of this ragdoll entity on and off.

name: EnableCustomCollisions
desc: Flags an entity as using custom lua defined collisions. Fixes entities having spongy player collisions or not hitting traces, such as after {{ClassFunction|Entity|PhysicsFromMesh}}

name: EnableMatrix
desc: Can be used to apply a custom VMatrix}} to the entity, mostly used for scaling the model by a {{Type|Vector.

name: EntIndex
desc: Gets the unique entity index of an entity.

name: Extinguish
desc: Extinguishes the entity if it is on fire.

name: EyeAngles
desc: Returns the direction a player/npc/ragdoll is looking as a world-oriented angle.

name: EyePos
desc: Returns the position of an Player/NPC's view, or two vectors for ragdolls (one for each eye)

name: FindBodygroupByName
desc: Searches for bodygroup with given name.

name: FindTransitionSequence
desc: Returns a transition from the given start and end sequence.

name: Fire
desc: Fires an entity's input. You can find inputs for most entities on the [https://developer.valvesoftware.com/wiki/Output Valve Developer Wiki]

name: FireBullets
desc: Fires a bullet.

name: FollowBone
desc: Makes an entity follow another entity's bone.

name: ForcePlayerDrop
desc: Forces the Entity to be dropped, when it is being held by a player's gravitygun or physgun.

name: FrameAdvance
desc: Advances the cycle of an animated entity by the given delta. Since cycle is a value between 0 and 1, delta should be as well.

name: GetAbsVelocity
desc: Returns the velocity of the entity, in coordinates relative to the world.

name: GetAnimInfo
desc: Returns a table containing the number of frames, flags, name, and FPS of an entity's animation ID.

name: GetAnimTime
desc: Returns the last time the entity had an animation update. Returns 0 if the entity doesn't animate.

name: GetAttachment
desc: Gets the orientation and position of the attachment by its ID.

name: GetAttachments
desc: Returns a table containing all attachments of the given entitys model.

name: GetBaseVelocity
desc: Returns the base velocity of the entity. "Velocity of the thing we're standing on".

name: GetBloodColor
desc: Returns the blood color of this entity. This can be set with {{ClassFunction|Entity|SetBloodColor}}.

name: GetBodygroup
desc: Gets the exact value for specific bodygroup of given entity.

name: GetBodygroupCount
desc: Returns the count of possible values for this bodygroup.

name: GetBodygroupName
desc: Gets the name of specific bodygroup for given entity.

name: GetBodyGroups
desc: Returns a list of all attachments of the entity.

name: GetBoneController
desc: Returns the value of the bone controller with the specified ID.

name: GetBoneCount
desc: Returns the amount of bones in the entity.

name: GetBoneMatrix
desc: Returns the matrix ( position / rotation transform ) of a given bone entity.

name: GetBoneName
desc: Returns name of given bone id.

name: GetBoneParent
desc: Returns parent bone of given bone.

name: GetBonePosition
desc: Returns the position and angle of the given attachment, relative to the world.

name: GetChildBones
desc: Returns ids of child bones of given bone.

name: GetChildren
desc: Gets the children of the entity - that is, every entity whose parent is this entity.

name: GetClass
desc: Returns the classname of a entity. This is often the name of the Lua file or folder containing the files for the entity

name: GetCollisionBounds
desc: Returns an entity's collision bounding box. In most cases, this will return the same bounding box as {{ClassFunction|Entity|GetModelBounds}} unless the entity does not have a physics mesh or it has a PhysObj different from the default.

name: GetCollisionGroup
desc: Returns the entity's collision group

name: GetConstrainedEntities
desc: Returns the two entities involved in a constraint ent

name: GetConstrainedPhysObjects
desc: Returns the two entities physobjects involved in a constraint ent

name: GetCreationID
desc: Returns entity's creation ID. Unlike {{ClassFunction|Entity|EntIndex}} or  {{ClassFunction|Entity|MapCreationID}}, it will always increase and old values won't be reused.

name: GetCreationTime
desc: Returns the time the entity was created on, relative to {{GlobalFunction|CurTime}}.

name: GetCreator
desc: Gets the creator of the SENT.

name: GetCustomCollisionCheck
desc: Returns whether this entity uses custom collision check set by {{ClassFunction|Entity|SetCustomCollisionCheck}}.

name: GetCycle
desc: Returns the frame of the currently played sequence.

name: GetDTAngle
desc: {{Internal}}

name: GetDTBool
desc: {{Internal}}

name: GetDTEntity
desc: {{Internal}}

name: GetDTFloat
desc: {{Internal}}

name: GetDTInt
desc: {{Internal}}

name: GetDTString
desc: {{Internal}}

name: GetDTVector
desc: {{Internal}}

name: GetEffects
desc: Returns a bit flag of all engine effect flags of the entity.

name: GetEFlags
desc: Returns a bit flag of all engine flags of the entity.

name: GetElasticity
desc: Returns the elasticity of this entity, used by some flying entities such as the Helicopter NPC to determine how much it should bounce around when colliding.

name: GetFlexBounds
desc: Returns acceptable value range for the flex.

name: GetFlexIDByName
desc: {{Stub}}

name: GetFlexName
desc: Returns flex name.

name: GetFlexNum
desc: Returns the number of flexes this entity has.

name: GetFlexScale
desc: Returns the flex scale of the entity.

name: GetFlexWeight
desc: Returns current weight ( value ) of the flex.

name: GetForward
desc: Returns the forward vector of the entity, as a normalized direction vector

name: GetFriction
desc: Returns how much friction an entity has. Entities default to 1 (100%) and can be higher or even negative.

name: GetGroundEntity
desc: Returns the object the entity is standing on.

name: GetGroundSpeedVelocity
desc: Returns the entity's ground speed velocity, which is based on the entity's walk/run speed and/or the ground speed of their sequence ( {{ClassFunction|Entity|GetSequenceGroundSpeed}} ). Will return an empty Vector if the entity isn't moving on the ground.

name: GetHitBoxBone
desc: Gets the bone of a hit box

name: GetHitboxBone
desc: {{Deprecated|You should use {{ClassFunction|Entity|GetHitBoxBone}} instead.}}

name: GetHitBoxBounds
desc: Gets the bounding box of a hit box

name: GetHitBoxCount
desc: Gets how many hit boxes are in a given hit box group

name: GetHitBoxGroupCount
desc: Returns the number of hit box groups that an entity has.

name: GetHitboxSet
desc: Returns entitys current hit box set

name: GetHitboxSetCount
desc: Returns the amount of hitbox sets in the entity.

name: GetInternalVariable
desc: An interface for accessing internal key values on entities.

name: GetKeyValues
desc: Returns a table containing all key values the entity has.

name: GetLayerCycle
desc: Returns the animation cycle/frame for given layer.

name: GetLayerDuration
desc: Returns the duration of given layer.

name: GetLayerWeight
desc: Returns the current weight of the layer. See {{ClassFunction|Entity|SetLayerWeight}} for more information.

name: GetLocalAngles
desc: Returns the rotation of the entity relative to its parent entity.

name: GetLocalAngularVelocity
desc: Returns the non-VPhysics angular velocity of the entity relative to its parent entity.

name: GetLocalPos
desc: Returns entity's position relative to it's parent.

name: GetManipulateBoneAngles
desc: Gets the entity's angle manipulation of the given bone. This is relative to the default angle, so the angle is zero when unmodified.

name: GetManipulateBoneJiggle
desc: {{Validate}}

name: GetManipulateBonePosition
desc: Gets the entity's position manipulation of the given bone. This is relative to the default position, so it is zero when unmodified.

name: GetManipulateBoneScale
desc: Gets the entity's scale manipulation of the given bone. Normal scale is Vector( 1, 1, 1 )

name: GetMaterial
desc: Returns the material override for this entity.

name: GetMaterials
desc: Returns all materials of the entity's model.

name: GetMaterialType
desc: Returns the surface index (from {{Enum|MAT}}) of this entity.

name: GetMaxHealth
desc: Returns the max health that the entity was given. It can be set via {{ClassFunction|Entity|SetMaxHealth}}.

name: GetModel
desc: Gets the model of given entity.

name: GetModelBounds
desc: Returns the entity's bounding box. Seems to be the same as calling {{ClassFunction|Entity|OBBMins}} and {{ClassFunction|Entity|OBBMaxs}}, however, if the model has been scaled using {{ClassFunction|Entity|SetModelScale}}, it will return the model's original and unmodified mins and maxs.

name: GetModelPhysBoneCount
desc: Gets the physics bone count of the entity's model.

name: GetModelRadius
desc: Gets the models radius.

name: GetModelRenderBounds
desc: {{Validate}}

name: GetModelScale
desc: Gets the selected entity's model scale.

name: GetMomentaryRotButtonPos
desc: Returns the amount a momentary_rot_button entity is turned based on the given Angle turnAngle. 0 meaning completely turned closed, 1 meaning completely turned open.

name: GetMoveCollide
desc: Returns the move collide type of the entity. The move collide is the way a physics object reacts to hitting an object - will it bounce, slide?

name: GetMoveParent
desc: Identical to {{ClassFunction|Entity|GetParent}}, there's no distinction between parent and movement parent in the engine.

name: GetMoveType
desc: Returns the entity's movetype

name: GetNetworkAngles
desc: Gets networked angles for entity.

name: GetNetworkedAngle
desc: {{Deprecated|You should use {{ClassFunction|Entity|GetNWAngle}} instead.}}

name: GetNetworkedBool
desc: {{Deprecated|You should use {{ClassFunction|Entity|GetNWBool}} instead.}}

name: GetNetworkedEntity
desc: {{Deprecated|You should use {{ClassFunction|Entity|GetNWEntity}} instead.}}

name: GetNetworkedFloat
desc: {{Deprecated|You should use {{ClassFunction|Entity|GetNWFloat}} instead.}}

name: GetNetworkedInt
desc: {{Deprecated|You should use {{ClassFunction|Entity|GetNWInt}} instead.}}

name: GetNetworkedString
desc: {{Deprecated|You should use {{ClassFunction|Entity|GetNWString}} instead.}}

name: GetNetworkedVarProxy
desc: {{Deprecated|You should be using {{ClassFunction|Entity|GetNWVarProxy}} instead.}}

name: GetNetworkedVarTable
desc: {{Deprecated|You should be using {{ClassFunction|Entity|GetNWVarTable}} instead.}}

name: GetNetworkedVector
desc: {{Deprecated|You should use {{ClassFunction|Entity|GetNWVector}} instead.}}

name: GetNetworkOrigin
desc: Gets networked origin for entity.

name: GetNoDraw
desc: Returns if the entity's rendering and transmitting has been disabled.

name: GetNumBodyGroups
desc: Returns the body group count of the entity.

name: GetNumPoseParameters
desc: Returns the number of pose parameters this entity has.

name: GetNWAngle
desc: Retrieves a networked angle value at specified index on the entity that is set by {{ClassFunction|Entity|SetNWAngle}}.

name: GetNWBool
desc: Retrieves a networked boolean value at specified index on the entity that is set by {{ClassFunction|Entity|SetNWBool}}.

name: GetNWEntity
desc: Retrieves a networked entity value at specified index on the entity that is set by {{ClassFunction|Entity|SetNWEntity}}.

name: GetNWFloat
desc: Retrieves a networked float value at specified index on the entity that is set by {{ClassFunction|Entity|SetNWFloat}}.

name: GetNWInt
desc: Retrieves a networked integer (whole number) value that was previously set by {{ClassFunction|Entity|SetNWInt}}.

name: GetNWString
desc: Retrieves a networked string value at specified index on the entity that is set by {{ClassFunction|Entity|SetNWString}}.

name: GetNWVarProxy
desc: Returns callback function for given NWVar of this entity.

name: GetNWVarTable
desc: Returns all the networked variables in an entity.

name: GetNWVector
desc: Retrieves a networked vector value at specified index on the entity that is set by {{ClassFunction|Entity|SetNWVector}}.

name: GetParentAttachment
desc: Returns the attachment index of the entity's parent. Returns 0 if the entity is not parented to a specific attachment or if it isn't parented at all.

name: GetParentPhysNum
desc: If the entity is parented to an entity that has a model with multiple physics objects (like a ragdoll), this is used to retrieve what physics object number the entity is parented to on it's parent.

name: GetPersistent
desc: Returns whether the entity is persistent or not.

name: GetPhysicsAttacker
desc: Returns player who is claiming kills of physics damage the entity deals.

name: GetPhysicsObject
desc: Returns the entity's physics object, if the entity has physics.

name: GetPhysicsObjectCount
desc: Returns the number of physics objects an entity has (usually 1 for non-ragdolls)

name: GetPhysicsObjectNum
desc: Returns a specific physics object from an entity with multiple (ragdolls)

name: GetPlaybackRate
desc: Returns the playback rate of the main sequence on this entity, with 1.0 being the default speed.

name: GetPoseParameter
desc: Returns the pose parameter value

name: GetPoseParameterName
desc: Returns name of given pose parameter

name: GetPoseParameterRange
desc: Returns pose parameter range

name: GetPredictable
desc: Returns whether this entity is predictable or not.

name: GetRagdollOwner
desc: Returns the entity which the ragdoll came from. The opposite of {{ClassFunction|Player|GetRagdollEntity}}.

name: GetRenderAngles
desc: Returns the entity's render angles, set by {{ClassFunction|Entity|SetRenderAngles}} in a drawing hook.

name: GetRenderBounds
desc: Returns render bounds of the entity. Can be overridden by {{ClassFunction|Entity|SetRenderBounds}}.

name: GetRenderFX
desc: Returns current render FX of the entity.

name: GetRenderGroup
desc: Returns the render group of the entity.

name: GetRenderMode
desc: Returns the render mode of the entity.

name: GetRenderOrigin
desc: Returns the entity's render origin, set by {{ClassFunction|Entity|SetRenderOrigin}} in a drawing hook.

name: GetRight
desc: Returns the rightward vector of the entity, as a normalized direction vector

name: GetRotatedAABB
desc: Returns the min and max of the entity's axis-aligned bounding box.

name: GetSaveTable
desc: Returns a table of save values for an entity.

name: GetSequence
desc: Return the index of the model sequence that is currently active for the entity.

name: GetSequenceActivity
desc: Return activity id out of sequence id. Opposite of {{ClassFunction|Entity|SelectWeightedSequence}}.

name: GetSequenceActivityName
desc: Returns the activity name for the given sequence id.

name: GetSequenceCount
desc: Returns the amount of sequences ( animations ) the entity's model has.

name: GetSequenceGroundSpeed
desc: Returns the ground speed of the entity's sequence.

name: GetSequenceInfo
desc: Returns a table of information about an entity's sequence.

name: GetSequenceList
desc: Returns a list of all sequences ( animations ) the model has.

name: GetSequenceMoveDist
desc: Returns an entity's sequence move distance (the change in position over the course of the entire sequence).

name: GetSequenceName
desc: Return the name of the sequence for the index provided.

name: GetShouldPlayPickupSound
desc: Returns true or false depending on whether or not the entity plays a physics contact sound when being picked up by a player.

name: GetShouldServerRagdoll
desc: Returns if entity should create a server ragdoll on death or a client one.

name: GetSkin
desc: Returns the skin index of the current skin.

name: GetSolid
desc: Returns solid type of an entity.

name: GetSolidFlags
desc: Returns solid flag(s) of an entity.

name: GetSpawnEffect
desc: Returns if we should show a spawn effect on this entity.

name: GetSpawnFlags
desc: Returns the bitwise spawn flags used by the entity.

name: GetSubMaterial
desc: Returns the material override for the given index.

name: GetSubModels
desc: Returns a list of models included into the entity's model in the .qc file.

name: GetTable
desc: Returns the table that contains all values saved within the entity.

name: GetTouchTrace
desc: Returns the last trace used in the collision callbacks such as {{HookFunction|ENTITY|StartTouch}}, {{HookFunction|ENTITY|Touch}} and {{HookFunction|ENTITY|EndTouch}}.

name: GetTransmitWithParent
desc: Returns true if the TransmitWithParent flag is set or not.

name: GetUnFreezable
desc: Returns if the entity is unfreezable, meaning it can't be frozen with the physgun. By default props are freezable, so this function will typically return nil.

name: GetUp
desc: Returns the upward vector of the entity, as a normalized direction vector

name: GetVar
desc: Retrieves a value from entitys {{ClassFunction|Entity|GetTable}}.

name: GetWorkshopID
desc: {{Deprecated}}Returns ID of workshop addon that the entity is from.

name: GibBreakClient
desc: Causes the entity to break into its current models gibs, if it has any.

name: GibBreakServer
desc: Causes the entity to break into its current models gibs, if it has any.

name: HasBoneManipulations
desc: Returns whether or not the entity has a bone which is manipulated using either {{ClassFunction|Entity|ManipulateBonePosition}}, {{ClassFunction|Entity|ManipulateBoneAngles}}, or {{ClassFunction|Entity|ManipulateBoneJiggle}}.

name: HasFlexManipulatior
desc: Returns whether or not the the entity has had flex manipulations performed with {{ClassFunction|Entity|SetFlexWeight}} or {{ClassFunction|Entity|SetFlexScale}}.

name: HasSpawnFlags
desc: Returns whether this entity has the specified spawnflags bits set.

name: HeadTarget
desc: Returns the position of the head of this entity, NPCs use this internally to aim at their targets.

name: Health
desc: Returns the health of the entity.

name: Ignite
desc: Sets the entity on fire.

name: InitializeAsClientEntity
desc: Initializes this entity as being clientside only.

name: Input
desc: Fires input to the entity with the ability to make another entity responsible. Similar to {{ClassFunction|Entity|Fire}}

name: InstallDataTable
desc: {{Internal}} Sets up Data Tables from entity to use with {{ClassFunction|Entity|NetworkVar}}.

name: InvalidateBoneCache
desc: Resets the entity's bone cache values in order to prepare for a model change.

name: IsConstrained
desc: Returns true if the entity has constraints attached to it

name: IsConstraint
desc: Returns if entity is constraint or not

name: IsDormant
desc: Returns whether the entity is dormant or not. Client/server entities become dormant when they leave the PVS on the server. Client side entities can decide for themselves whether to become dormant. This mainly applies to PVS.

name: IsEffectActive
desc: Returns whether an entity has engine effect applied or not.

name: IsEFlagSet
desc: Checks if given flag is set or not.

name: IsFlagSet
desc: Checks if given flag(s) is set or not.

name: IsInWorld
desc: Returns whether the entity is inside a wall or outside of the map.

name: IsLagCompensated
desc: Returns whether the entity is lag compensated or not.

name: IsLineOfSightClear
desc: Returns true if the target is in line of sight.

name: IsNPC
desc: Checks if the entity is an NPC or not.

name: IsOnFire
desc: Returns whether the entity is on fire.

name: IsPlayer
desc: Checks if the entity is a player or not.

name: IsPlayerHolding
desc: Returns true if the entity is being held by a player. Either by Physics gun, Gravity gun or Use-key.

name: IsPlayingGesture
desc: Returns whether there's a gesture is given activity being played.

name: IsRagdoll
desc: Checks if the entity is a ragdoll.

name: IsSolid
desc: Returns if the entity is solid or not.

name: IsValidLayer
desc: Returns whether the given layer ID is valid and exists on this entity.

name: IsVehicle
desc: Checks if the entity is a vehicle or not.

name: IsWeapon
desc: Checks if the entity is a weapon or not.

name: IsWidget
desc: Returns whether the entity is a widget or not.

name: IsWorld
desc: Returns if the entity is the map's Entity[0] worldspawn

name: LocalToWorld
desc: Converts a vector local to an entity into a worldspace vector

name: LocalToWorldAngles
desc: Converts a local angle (local to the entity) to a world angle.

name: LookupAttachment
desc: Gets the attachment index of the given attachment name, returns nothing if the attachment does not exist.

name: LookupBone
desc: Gets the bone index of the given bone name, returns nothing if the bone does not exist.

name: LookupSequence
desc: Returns sequence ID from its name.

name: MakePhysicsObjectAShadow
desc: Turns the {{ClassFunction|Entity|GetPhysicsObject}} into a physics shadow.

name: ManipulateBoneAngles
desc: Sets custom bone angles.

name: ManipulateBoneJiggle
desc: Manipulates the bone's jiggle value(s).

name: ManipulateBonePosition
desc: Sets custom bone offsets.

name: ManipulateBoneScale
desc: Sets custom bone scale.

name: MapCreationID
desc: Returns entity's map creation ID. Unlike {{ClassFunction|Entity|EntIndex}} or {{ClassFunction|Entity|GetCreationID}}, it will always be the same on same map, no matter how much you clean up or restart it.

name: MarkShadowAsDirty
desc: Refreshes the shadow of the entity.

name: MuzzleFlash
desc: Fires the muzzle flash effect of the weapon the entity is carrying. This only creates a light effect and is often called alongside {{ClassFunction|Weapon|SendWeaponAnim}}

name: NearestPoint
desc: Performs a Ray OBBox intersection from the given position to the origin of the OBBox with the entity and returns the hit position on the OBBox

name: NetworkVar
desc: Creates a network variable on the entity and adds Set/Get functions for it. This function should only be called in {{HookFunction|ENTITY|SetupDataTables}}.

name: NetworkVarNotify
desc: Creates a callback that will execute when the given network variable changes - that is, when the Set<name> function is run.

name: NextThink
desc: In the case of a scripted entity, this will cause the next {{HookFunction|ENTITY|Think}} event to be run at the given time.

name: OBBCenter
desc: Returns the center of an entity's bounding box as a local vector.

name: OBBMaxs
desc: Returns the highest corner of an entity's bounding box as a local vector.

name: OBBMins
desc: Returns the lowest corner of an entity's bounding box as a local vector.

name: ObjectCaps
desc: Returns the entity's capabilities as a bitfield.

name: OnGround
desc: Returns true if the entity is on the ground, and false if it isn't.

name: PassesDamageFilter
desc: Tests whether the damage passes the entity filter.

name: PassesFilter
desc: Tests whether the entity passes the entity filter.

name: PhysicsDestroy
desc: Destroys the current physics object of an entity.

name: PhysicsFromMesh
desc: Initializes the physics mesh of the entity from a triangle soup defined by a table of vertices. The resulting mesh is hollow, may contain holes, and always has a volume of 0.

name: PhysicsInit
desc: Initializes the physics object of the entity using its current model. Deletes the previous physics object if there was any.

name: PhysicsInitBox
desc: Makes the physics object of the entity a AABB.

name: PhysicsInitConvex
desc: Initializes the physics mesh of the entity with a convex mesh defined by a table of points. The resulting mesh is the [[wikipedia:Convex hull|convex hull]] of all the input points.

name: PhysicsInitMultiConvex
desc: An advanced version of {{ClassFunction|Entity|PhysicsInitConvex}} which initializes a physics object from multiple convex meshes.

name: PhysicsInitShadow
desc: Removes the old {{ClassFunction|Entity|GetPhysicsObject}} and initializes it as a physics shadow.

name: PhysicsInitSphere
desc: Makes the physics object of the entity a sphere.

name: PhysWake
desc: Wakes up the entity's physics object

name: PlayScene
desc: Makes the entity play a .vcd scene.

name: PointAtEntity
desc: Changes an entities angles so that it faces the target entity.

name: PrecacheGibs
desc: Precaches gibs for the entity. This is required for {{ClassFunction|Entity|GibBreakServer}} and {{ClassFunction|Entity|GibBreakClient}} to work.

name: RagdollSolve
desc: Normalizes the ragdoll. This is used alongside Kinect in {{ClassFunction|Entity|SetRagdollBuildFunction}}, for more info see ragdoll_motion entity.

name: RagdollStopControlling
desc: Sets the function to build the ragdoll. This is used alongside Kinect in {{ClassFunction|Entity|SetRagdollBuildFunction}}, for more info see ragdoll_motion entity.

name: RagdollUpdatePhysics
desc: Makes the physics objects follow the set bone positions. This is used alongside Kinect in {{ClassFunction|Entity|SetRagdollBuildFunction}}, for more info see ragdoll_motion entity.

name: RemoveAllDecals
desc: Removes all decals from the entities surface.

name: RemoveAllGestures
desc: Removes and stops all gestures.

name: RemoveCallOnRemove
desc: Removes the CallOnRemove'd function referred to by identifier

name: RemoveEffects
desc: Removes an engine effect applied to an entity.

name: RemoveEFlags
desc: Removes specified engine flag

name: RemoveFlags
desc: Removes specified flag(s) from the entity

name: RemoveFromMotionController
desc: Removes a PhysObj}}ect from the entity's motion controller so that {{HookFunction|ENTITY|PhysicsSimulate}} will no longer be called for given {{Type|PhysObject.

name: RemoveGesture
desc: Removes and stop the gesture with given activity.

name: RemoveSolidFlags
desc: Removes solid flag(s) from the entity.

name: ResetSequence
desc: Plays an animations on the entity. This may not always work on engine entities.

name: ResetSequenceInfo
desc: Reset entity sequence info such as playback rate, ground speed, last event check, etc.

name: Respawn
desc: Makes the entity/weapon respawn.

name: RestartGesture
desc: Restarts the entity's animation gesture. If the given gesture is already playing, it will reset it and play it from the beginning.

name: SelectWeightedSequence
desc: Returns sequence ID corresponding to given activity id. Opposite of {{ClassFunction|Entity|GetSequenceActivity}}. Similar to {{ClassFunction|Entity|LookupSequence}}

name: SendViewModelMatchingSequence
desc: Sends sequence animation to the view model. It is recommended to use this for view model animations, instead of {{ClassFunction|Entity|ResetSequence}}.

name: SequenceDuration
desc: Returns length of currently played sequence.

name: SetAbsVelocity
desc: Sets the entity's velocity.

name: SetAngles
desc: Sets the angles of the entity.

name: SetAnimation
desc: Sets a player's third-person animation. Mainly used by Weapons to start the player's weapon attack and reload animations.

name: SetAnimTime
desc: Sets the time (relative to {{GlobalFunction|CurTime}}) of the current animation frame, which is used to determine {{ClassFunction|Entity|GetCycle}}.

name: SetAttachment
desc: {{Deprecated|You should be using {{ClassFunction|Entity|SetParent}} instead.}}

name: SetBloodColor
desc: Sets the blood color this entity uses.

name: SetBodygroup
desc: Sets an entities' bodygroup.

name: SetBodyGroups
desc: Sets the bodygroups from a string. A convenience function for {{ClassFunction|Entity|SetBodygroup}}.

name: SetBoneController
desc: Sets the specified value on the bone controller with the given ID of this entity, it's used in HL1 to change the head rotation of NPCs, turret aiming and so on.

name: SetBoneMatrix
desc: {{Stub}}

name: SetBonePosition
desc: Sets the bone position and angles.

name: SetCollisionBounds
desc: Sets the collision bounds for the entity, which are used for triggers ( {{ClassFunction|Entity|SetTrigger}}, {{HookFunction|ENTITY|Touch}} ), determining if rendering is necessary clientside, and collision ( If {{ClassFunction|Entity|SetSolid}} set as [[Enums/SOLID|SOLID_BBOX]] ).

name: SetCollisionBoundsWS
desc: Sets the collision bounds for the entity, which are used for triggers ( {{ClassFunction|Entity|SetTrigger}}, {{HookFunction|ENTITY|Touch}} ), determining if rendering is necessary clientside, and collision ( If {{ClassFunction|Entity|SetSolid}} set as [[Enums/SOLID|SOLID_BBOX]] ).

name: SetCollisionGroup
desc: Sets the entity's collision group.

name: SetColor
desc: Sets the color of an entity.

name: SetCreator
desc: Sets the creator of the SENT.

name: SetCustomCollisionCheck
desc: Marks the entity to call {{HookFunction|GM|ShouldCollide}}.

name: SetCycle
desc: Sets the progress of the current animation to a specific value between 0 and 1.

name: SetDTAngle
desc: {{Internal}}

name: SetDTBool
desc: {{Internal}}

name: SetDTEntity
desc: {{Internal}}

name: SetDTFloat
desc: {{Internal}}

name: SetDTInt
desc: {{Internal}}

name: SetDTString
desc: {{Internal}}

name: SetDTVector
desc: {{Internal}}

name: SetElasticity
desc: Sets the elasticity of this entity, used by some flying entities such as the Helicopter NPC to determine how much it should bounce around when colliding.

name: SetEntity
desc: Allows you to set the Start or End entity attachment for the rope.

name: SetEyeTarget
desc: Sets the position an entity's eyes look toward.

name: SetFlexScale
desc: Sets the flex scale of the entity.

name: SetFlexWeight
desc: Sets the flex weight.

name: SetFriction
desc: Sets how much friction an entity has when sliding against a surface. Entities default to 1 (100%) and can be higher or even negative.

name: SetGravity
desc: Sets the gravity multiplier of the entity.

name: SetGroundEntity
desc: Sets the ground the entity is standing on.

name: SetHealth
desc: Sets the health of the entity.

name: SetIK
desc: Enables or disable the inverse kinematic usage of this entity.

name: SetKeyValue
desc: Sets key value for the entity.

name: SetLagCompensated
desc: This allows the entity to be lag compensated during {{ClassFunction|Player|LagCompensation}}.

name: SetLayerBlendIn
desc: {{Stub}}

name: SetLayerBlendOut
desc: {{Stub}}

name: SetLayerCycle
desc: Sets the animation cycle/frame of given layer.

name: SetLayerDuration
desc: Sets the duration of given layer. This internally overrides the {{ClassFunction|Entity|SetLayerPlaybackRate}}.

name: SetLayerLooping
desc: Sets whether the layer should loop or not.

name: SetLayerPlaybackRate
desc: Sets the layer player back rate. See also {{ClassFunction|Entity|SetLayerDuration}}.

name: SetLayerPriority
desc: Sets the priority of given layer.

name: SetLayerWeight
desc: Sets the layer weight. This influences how strongly the animation should be overriding the normal animations of the entity.

name: SetLegacyTransform
desc: This forces an entity to use the bone transformation behaviour from versions prior to '''14.07.08'''.

name: SetLocalAngles
desc: Sets angles relative to angles of {{ClassFunction|Entity|GetParent}}

name: SetLocalPos
desc: Sets local position relative to the parented position. This is for use with {{ClassFunction|Entity|SetParent}} to offset position.

name: SetLocalVelocity
desc: Sets the entity's local velocity. Same as {{ClassFunction|Entity|SetAbsVelocity}}, but clamps given velocity, and is not recommended to be used because of that.

name: SetLOD
desc: Sets the Level Of Detail model to use with this entity. This may not work for all models if the model doesn't include any LOD sub models.

name: SetMaterial
desc: Sets the rendering material override of the entity.

name: SetMaxHealth
desc: Sets the maximum health for entity. Note, that you can still set entity's health above this amount with {{ClassFunction|Entity|SetHealth}}.

name: SetModel
desc: Sets the model of the entity.

name: SetModelName
desc: Sets the model name returned by {{ClassFunction|Entity|GetModel}}. Does not actually alter the entity's model.

name: SetModelScale
desc: Scales the model of the entity, if the entity is a Player}} or an {{Type|NPC the hitboxes will be scaled as well.

name: SetMoveCollide
desc: Sets the move collide type of the entity. The move collide is the way a physics object reacts to hitting an object - will it bounce, slide?

name: SetMoveParent
desc: Sets the Movement Parent of an entity to another entity. Similar to {{ClassFunction|Entity|SetParent}}, except the object's coordinates are not translated automatically before parenting.

name: SetMoveType
desc: Sets the entitys movetype.

name: SetName
desc: Sets the mapping name of the entity.

name: SetNetworkAngles
desc: Alters networked entity angles.

name: SetNetworkedAngle
desc: {{Deprecated|You should use {{ClassFunction|Entity|SetNWAngle}} instead.}}

name: SetNetworkedBool
desc: {{Deprecated|You should use {{ClassFunction|Entity|SetNWBool}} instead.}}

name: SetNetworkedEntity
desc: {{Deprecated|You should use {{ClassFunction|Entity|SetNWEntity}} instead.}}

name: SetNetworkedFloat
desc: {{Deprecated|You should use {{ClassFunction|Entity|SetNWFloat}} instead.}}

name: SetNetworkedInt
desc: {{Deprecated|You should use {{ClassFunction|Entity|SetNWInt}} instead.}}

name: SetNetworkedNumber
desc: Sets a networked number at the specified index on the entity.

name: SetNetworkedString
desc: {{Deprecated|You should use {{ClassFunction|Entity|SetNWString}} instead.}}

name: SetNetworkedVarProxy
desc: {{Deprecated|You should be using {{ClassFunction|Entity|SetNWVarProxy}} instead.}}

name: SetNetworkedVector
desc: {{Deprecated|You should use {{ClassFunction|Entity|SetNWVector}} instead.}}

name: SetNetworkOrigin
desc: Virtually changes entity position for clients.

name: SetNextClientThink
desc: Sets the next time the clientside {{HookFunction|ENTITY|Think}} is called.

name: SetNoDraw
desc: Sets if the entity's model should render at all

name: SetNotSolid
desc: Sets whether the entity is solid or not.

name: SetNWAngle
desc: Sets a networked angle value on the entity.

name: SetNWBool
desc: Sets a networked boolean value on the entity.

name: SetNWEntity
desc: Sets a networked entity value on the entity.

name: SetNWFloat
desc: Sets a networked float (number) value on the entity.

name: SetNWInt
desc: Sets a networked integer (whole number) value on the entity.

name: SetNWString
desc: Sets a networked string value on the entity.

name: SetNWVarProxy
desc: Sets a function to be called when the NWVar changes.

name: SetNWVector
desc: Sets a networked vector value on the entity.

name: SetOwner
desc: Sets the owner of this entity, disabling all physics interaction with it.

name: SetParent
desc: Sets the parent of this entity.

name: SetParentPhysNum
desc: Sets the parent of an entity to another entity with the given physics bone number. Similar to {{ClassFunction|Entity|SetParent}}, except it is parented to a physbone. This function is useful mainly for ragdolls.

name: SetPersistent
desc: Sets whether or not the given entity is persistent. A persistent entity will be saved on server shutdown and loaded back when the server starts up. Additionally, by default persistent entities cannot be grabbed with the physgun and tools cannot be used on them.

name: SetPhysConstraintObjects
desc: When called on a constraint entity, sets the two physics objects to be constrained.

name: SetPhysicsAttacker
desc: Sets the player who gets credit if this entity kills something with physics damage within the time limit.

name: SetPlaybackRate
desc: Allows you to set how fast an entity's animation will play, with 1.0 being the default speed.

name: SetPoseParameter
desc: Sets the specified pose parameter to the specified value.

name: SetPredictable
desc: Sets whether an entity should be predictable or not.

name: SetPreventTransmit
desc: Prevents the server from sending any further information about the entity to a player.

name: SetRagdollAng
desc: Sets the bone angles. This is used alongside Kinect in {{ClassFunction|Entity|SetRagdollBuildFunction}}, for more info see ragdoll_motion entity.

name: SetRagdollBuildFunction
desc: Sets the function to build the ragdoll. This is used alongside Kinect, for more info see ragdoll_motion entity.

name: SetRagdollPos
desc: Sets the bone position. This is used alongside Kinect in {{ClassFunction|Entity|SetRagdollBuildFunction}}, for more info see ragdoll_motion entity.

name: SetRenderAngles
desc: Sets the render angles of the Entity.

name: SetRenderBounds
desc: Sets the render bounds for the entity. For world space coordinates see {{ClassFunction|Entity|SetRenderBoundsWS}}.

name: SetRenderBoundsWS
desc: Sets the render bounds for the entity in world space coordinates. For relative coordinates see {{ClassFunction|Entity|SetRenderBounds}}.

name: SetRenderClipPlane
desc: Used to specify a plane, past which an object will be visually clipped.

name: SetRenderClipPlaneEnabled
desc: Enables the use of clipping planes to "cut" objects.

name: SetRenderFX
desc: Sets entity's render FX.

name: SetRenderMode
desc: Sets the render mode of the entity.

name: SetRenderOrigin
desc: Set the origin in which the Entity will be drawn from.

name: SetSaveValue
desc: Sets a save value for an entity.

name: SetSequence
desc: Sets the entity's model sequence. If the specified sequence is already active, the animation will not be restarted. See also {{ClassFunction|Entity|ResetSequence}}.

name: SetShouldPlayPickupSound
desc: Sets whether or not the entity should make a physics contact sound when it's been picked up by a player.

name: SetShouldServerRagdoll
desc: Sets if entity should create a server ragdoll on death or a client one.

name: SetSkin
desc: Sets the skin of the entity.

name: SetSolid
desc: Sets the solidity of an entity.

name: SetSolidFlags
desc: Sets solid flag(s) for the entity.

name: SetSpawnEffect
desc: Sets whether the entity should use a spawn effect. See also: {{ClassFunction|Entity|GetSpawnEffect}}

name: SetSubMaterial
desc: Overrides a single material on the model of this entity.

name: SetTable
desc: Changes the table that can be accessed by indexing an entity. Each entity starts with its own table by default.

name: SetTransmitWithParent
desc: When this flag is set the entity will only transmit to the player when its parent is transmitted. This is useful for things like viewmodel attachments since without this flag they will transmit to everyone (and cause the viewmodels to transmit to everyone too).

name: SetTrigger
desc: Marks the entity as a trigger, so it will generate {{HookFunction|ENTITY|StartTouch}}, {{HookFunction|ENTITY|Touch}} and {{HookFunction|ENTITY|EndTouch}} callbacks

name: SetUnFreezable
desc: Sets whether an entity can be unfrozen, meaning that it cannot be unfrozen using the physgun.

name: SetupBones
desc: Forces the entity to reconfigure its bones. You might need to call this after changing your model's scales or when manually drawing the entity multiple times at different positions.

name: SetupPhonemeMappings
desc: Initializes the class names of an entity's phoneme mappings (mouth movement data). This is called by default with argument "phonemes" when a flex-based entity (such as an NPC) is created.

name: SetUseType
desc: Sets the use type of an entity, affecting how often {{HookFunction|ENTITY|Use}} will be called for Lua entities.

name: SetVar
desc: Allows to quickly set variable to entitys {{ClassFunction|Entity|GetTable}}.

name: SetWeaponModel
desc: Sets the model and associated weapon to this viewmodel entity.

name: SkinCount
desc: Returns the amount of skins the entity has.

name: SnatchModelInstance
desc: Moves the model instance from the source entity to this entity. This can be used to transfer decals that have been applied on one entity to another.

name: Spawn
desc: Initializes the entity and starts its networking.

name: StartLoopingSound
desc: The function seems to be broken.

name: StartMotionController
desc: Starts a motion controller in the physics engine tied to this entity's PhysObj}}, which enables the use of {{HookFunction|ENTITY|PhysicsSimulate.

name: StopAndDestroyParticles
desc: Stops all particle effects parented to the entity and immediately destroys them.

name: StopLoopingSound
desc: The function seems to be broken.

name: StopMotionController
desc: Stops the motion controller created with {{ClassFunction|Entity|StartMotionController}}.

name: StopParticleEmission
desc: Stops all particle effects parented to the entity.

name: StopParticles
desc: Stops any attached to the entity .pcf particles using {{GlobalFunction|ParticleEffectAttach}}.

name: StopParticlesNamed
desc: Stops all particle effects parented to the entity with given name.

name: StopParticlesWithNameAndAttachment
desc: Stops all particle effects parented to the entity with given name on given attachment.

name: StopSound
desc: Stops emitting the given sound from the entity.

name: TakeDamage
desc: Applies the specified amount of damage to the entity.

name: TakeDamageInfo
desc: Applies the damage specified by the damage info to the entity.

name: TakePhysicsDamage
desc: Applies physics damage to the entity

name: TestPVS
desc: Check if the given position or entity is within this entity's PVS.

name: TranslateBoneToPhysBone
desc: Gets the phys bone for a bone

name: TranslatePhysBoneToBone
desc: Gets the bone number corresponding to a physics bone.

name: Use
desc: Activates the entity, as if a player pressed the Use key (Default {{Key|E}}) on it.

name: UseClientSideAnimation
desc: {{Stub}}

name: UseTriggerBounds
desc: Enables or disables trigger bounds.

name: ViewModelIndex
desc: Returns the index of this view model, it can be used to identify which one of the player's view models this entity is.

name: Visible
desc: Returns true if the provided entity is visible from the passed entity.

name: VisibleVec
desc: Returns true if supplied vector is visible from the entity's line of sight.

name: WaterLevel
desc: Returns an integer that represents how deep in water the entity is.

name: Weapon_SetActivity
desc: {{Stub}}

name: Weapon_TranslateActivity
desc: Calls and returns {{HookFunction|WEAPON|TranslateActivity}} on the weapon the entity ( player or NPC ) carries.

name: WorldSpaceAABB
desc: Returns two vectors representing the minimum and maximum extent of the entity's bounding box.

name: WorldSpaceCenter
desc: Returns the center of the entity according to its collision model.

name: WorldToLocal
desc: Converts a worldspace vector into a vector local to an entity

name: WorldToLocalAngles
desc: Converts world angles to local angles ( local to the entity )

name: Close
desc: Dumps the file changes to disk and closes the file handle which makes the handle useless.

name: Flush
desc: Dumps the file changes to disk and saves the file.

name: Read
desc: Reads the specified amount of chars and returns them as a binary string.

name: ReadByte
desc: Reads one unsigned 8-bit integer from the file.

name: ReadDouble
desc: Reads 8 bytes from the file converts them to a double and returns them.

name: ReadLine
desc: Returns the contents of the file from the current position up until the end of the current line. This function will not return more than 8192 characters.

name: Seek
desc: Sets the file pointer to the specified position.

name: Size
desc: Returns the size of the file in bytes.

name: Skip
desc: Moves the file pointer by the specified amount of chars.

name: Tell
desc: Returns the current position of the file pointer.

name: Write
desc: Writes the given string into the file.

name: WriteBool
desc: Writes on byte, representing the a Boolean to the file.

name: WriteByte
desc: Write an 8-bit unsigned integer to the file.

name: WriteDouble
desc: Writes a 8byte floating point double to the file.

name: WriteFloat
desc: Writes a 4byte float to the file.

name: WriteLong
desc: Writes a 32-bit signed integer to the file.

name: WriteShort
desc: Writes a 16-bit signed integer to the file.

name: EnableLooping
desc: Enables or disables looping of audio channel, requires noblock flag.

name: FFT
desc: Computes the [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Discrete_Fourier_transform DFT (discrete Fourier transform)] of the sound channel.

name: Get3DCone
desc: Returns 3D cone of the sound channel. See {{ClassFunction|IGModAudioChannel|Set3DCone}}.

name: Get3DFadeDistance
desc: Returns 3D fade distances of a sound channel.

name: GetBitsPerSample
desc: Retrieves the number of bits per sample of the sound channel.

name: GetFileName
desc: Returns the filename for the sound channel.

name: GetLevel
desc: Returns the right and left levels of sound played by the sound channel.

name: GetSamplingRate
desc: Returns the sample rate for currently playing sound.

name: GetState
desc: Returns the state of a sound channel

name: GetTime
desc: Returns the current time of the sound channel

name: IsBlockStreamed
desc: Returns whether the audio stream is block streamed or not.

name: IsLooping
desc: Returns if the sound channel is looping or not.

name: IsOnline
desc: Returns if the sound channel is streamed from the Internet or not.

name: Pause
desc: Pauses the stream. It can be started again using {{ClassFunction|IGModAudioChannel|Play}}

name: Set3DCone
desc: Sets 3D cone of the sound channel.

name: Set3DFadeDistance
desc: Sets 3D fade distances of a sound channel.

name: SetPlaybackRate
desc: Sets the playback rate of the sound channel. May not work with high values for radio streams.

name: SetPos
desc: Sets position of sound channel in case the sound channel has a 3d option set.

name: SetTime
desc: Sets the sound channel to specified time ( Rewind to that position of the song ). Does not work on online radio streams.

name: SetVolume
desc: Sets the volume of a sound channel

name: GetColor
desc: Returns the color of the specified pixel, only works for materials created from PNG files.

name: GetFloat
desc: Returns the specified material value as a float, or nil if the value is not set.

name: GetInt
desc: Returns the specified material value as a int, rounds the value if its a float, or nil if the value is not set.

name: GetMatrix
desc: Returns the specified material matrix as a int, or nil if the value is not set or is not a matrix.

name: GetShader
desc: Returns the name of the materials shader.

name: GetString
desc: Returns the specified material string, or nil if the value is not set or if the value can not be converted to a string.

name: GetTexture
desc: Returns an ITexture based on the passed shader parameter.

name: GetVector
desc: Returns the specified material linear color vector, or nil if the value is not set.

name: Height
desc: Returns the height of the member texture set for $basetexture.

name: IsError
desc: Returns whenever the material was not loaded successfully.

name: Recompute
desc: Recomputes the material's snapshot. This needs to be called if you have changed variables on your material and it isn't changing.

name: SetFloat
desc: Sets the specified material float to the specified float, does nothing on a type mismatch.

name: SetInt
desc: Sets the specified material value to the specified int, does nothing on a type mismatch.

name: SetMatrix
desc: Sets the specified material value to the specified matrix, does nothing on a type mismatch.

name: SetShader
desc: {{Deprecated|This function does nothing}}The functionality of this function was removed due to the amount of crashes it caused.

name: SetString
desc: Sets the specified material value to the specified string, does nothing on a type mismatch.

name: SetTexture
desc: Sets the specified material texture to the specified texture, does nothing on a type mismatch.

name: SetUndefined
desc: Unsets the value for the specified material value.

name: SetVector
desc: Sets the specified material vector to the specified vector, does nothing on a type mismatch.

name: Width
desc: Returns the width of the member texture set for $basetexture.

name: BuildFromTriangles
desc: Builds the mesh from a table mesh vertexes.

name: Destroy
desc: Deletes the mesh and frees the memory used by it..
