name: EndBlock
desc: Ends current data block started with {{ClassFunction|IRestore|StartBlock}} and returns to the parent block.

name: ReadInt
desc: Reads next bytes from the restore object as an integer number.

name: StartBlock
desc: Loads next block of data to be read inside current block. Blocks '''must''' be ended with {{ClassFunction|IRestore|EndBlock}}.

name: StartBlock
desc: Starts a new block of data that you can write to inside current block. Blocks '''must''' be ended with {{ClassFunction|ISave|EndBlock}}.

name: WriteAngle
desc: Writes an Angle to the save object.

name: WriteEntity
desc: Writes an Entity to the save object.

name: WriteInt
desc: Writes an integer number to the save object.

name: WriteString
desc: Writes a string to the save object.

name: WriteVector
desc: Writes a Vector to the save object.

name: Download
desc: Invokes the generator of the texture. Reloads file based textures from disk and clears render target textures.

name: GetMappingHeight
desc: Returns the true unmodified height of the texture.

name: GetMappingWidth
desc: Returns the true unmodified width of the texture.

name: AddFrame
desc: Adds the current framebuffer to the video stream.

name: SetRecordSound
desc: Sets whether to record sound or not.

name: Create
desc: {{Internal}}

name: Draw
snippet: Draw(${1:number xOffset},${2:number yOffset},${3:number xAlign},${4:number yAlign},${5:number alphaoverride=255})
desc: Draws the computed markupobject to the screen.

name: GetHeight
desc: Gets computed the height of the markupobject.

name: GetWidth
desc: Gets computed the width of the markupobject.

name: BecomeRagdoll
desc: Become a ragdoll and remove the entity.

name: BodyMoveXY
desc: Should only be called in BodyUpdate. This sets the move_x and move_y pose parameters of the bot to fit how they're currently moving, sets the animation speed to suit the ground speed and calls FrameAdvance.

name: FindSpot
desc: Like {{ClassFunction|NextBot|FindSpots}} but only returns a vector.

name: FindSpots
desc: Returns a table of hiding spots.

name: GetActivity
desc: Returns the currently running activity

name: GetRangeSquaredTo
desc: Returns the distance to an entity or position. It is supposed to return a squared distance, however.

name: GetRangeTo
desc: Returns the distance to an entity or position

name: GetSolidMask
desc: Returns the solid mask for given NextBot.

name: HandleStuck
desc: Called from Lua when the NPC is stuck. This should only be called from the behaviour coroutine - so if you want to override this function and do something special that yields - then go for it.

name: MoveToPos
desc: To be called in the behaviour coroutine only! Will yield until the bot has reached the goal or is stuck

name: PlaySequenceAndWait
desc: To be called in the behaviour coroutine only! Plays an animation sequence and waits for it to end before returning.

name: SetSolidMask
desc: Sets the solid mask for given NextBot.

name: StartActivity
desc: Start doing an activity (animation)

name: AddEntityRelationship
desc: Makes the NPC like, hate, feel neutral towards, or fear the entity in question. If you want to setup relationship towards a certain entity ''class'', use {{ClassFunction|NPC|AddRelationship}}.

name: AddRelationship
desc: Changes how an NPC feels towards another NPC.  If you want to setup relationship towards a certain ''entity'', use {{ClassFunction|NPC|AddEntityRelationship}}.

name: AlertSound
desc: Force an NPC to play his Alert sound.

name: CapabilitiesAdd
desc: Adds a capability to the NPC.

name: CapabilitiesClear
desc: Removes all of Capabilities the NPC has.

name: CapabilitiesGet
desc: Returns the NPC's capabilities along the ones defined on its weapon.

name: CapabilitiesRemove
desc: Remove a certain capability.

name: Classify
desc: Returns the NPC class. Do not confuse with {{ClassFunction|Entity|GetClass}}!

name: ClearCondition
desc: Clears out the specified {{Enum|COND}} on this NPC.

name: ClearEnemyMemory
desc: Clears the Enemy from the NPC's memory, effectively forgetting it until met again with either the NPC vision or with {{ClassFunction|NPC|UpdateEnemyMemory}}.

name: ClearExpression
desc: Clears the NPC's current expression which can be set with {{ClassFunction|NPC|SetExpression}}.

name: ClearSchedule
desc: Stops the current schedule that the NPC is doing.

name: ConditionName
desc: Translates condition ID to a string.

name: Disposition
desc: Returns the way the NPC "feels" about the entity.

name: ExitScriptedSequence
desc: Makes an NPC exit a scripted sequence, if one is playing.

name: FearSound
desc: Force an NPC to play his Fear sound.

name: FoundEnemySound
desc: Force an NPC to play its FoundEnemy sound.

name: GetActiveWeapon
desc: Returns the weapon the NPC is currently carrying, or [http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global_Variables NULL].

name: GetAimVector
desc: Returns the aim vector of the NPC. NPC alternative of {{ClassFunction|Player|GetAimVector}}.

name: GetArrivalActivity
desc: Returns the activity to be played when the NPC arrives at its goal

name: GetCurrentWeaponProficiency
desc: Returns how proficient (skilled) an NPC is with its current weapon.

name: GetEnemy
desc: Returns the entity that this NPC is trying to fight

name: GetExpression
desc: Returns the expression file the NPC is currently playing.

name: GetHullType
desc: Returns NPCs hull type set by {{ClassFunction|NPC|SetHullType}}.

name: GetMovementActivity
desc: Returns the NPC's current movement activity.

name: GetMovementSequence
desc: Returns the index of the sequence the NPC uses to move.

name: GetNPCState
desc: Returns the NPC's state.

name: GetShootPos
desc: Returns the shooting position of the NPC.

name: Give
desc: Used to give a weapon to an already spawned NPC.

name: HasCondition
desc: Returns whether or not the NPC has the given condition.

name: IdleSound
desc: Force an NPC to play his Idle sound.

name: IsCurrentSchedule
desc: Returns whether or not the NPC is performing the given schedule.

name: IsMoving
desc: Returns whether the NPC is moving or not.

name: IsUnreachable
desc: Returns whether the entity given can be reached by this NPC.

name: LostEnemySound
desc: Force an NPC to play his LostEnemy sound.

name: MarkEnemyAsEluded
desc: Causes the NPC to temporarily forget the current enemy and switch on to a better one.

name: NavSetGoalTarget
desc: Set the goal target for an NPC.

name: NavSetWanderGoal
desc: Sets a goal in x, y offsets for the npc to wander to

name: PlaySentence
desc: Forces the NPC to play a sentence from scripts/sentences.txt

name: SetCondition
desc: Sets an NPC condition.

name: SetCurrentWeaponProficiency
desc: Sets the weapon proficiency of an NPC (how skilled an NPC is with its current weapon).

name: SetEnemy
desc: Sets the target for an NPC.

name: SetExpression
desc: Sets the NPC's .vcd expression. Similar to {{ClassFunction|Entity|PlayScene}} except the scene is looped until it's interrupted by default NPC behavior or {{ClassFunction|NPC|ClearExpression}}.

name: SetHullSizeNormal
desc: Updates the NPC's hull and physics hull in order to match its model scale. {{ClassFunction|Entity|SetModelScale}} seems to take care of this regardless.

name: SetHullType
desc: Sets the hull type for the NPC.

name: SetLastPosition
desc: Sets the last registered or memorized position for an npc. When using scheduling, the NPC will focus on navigating to the last position via nodes.

name: SetMovementActivity
desc: Sets the activity the NPC uses when it moves.

name: SetMovementSequence
desc: Sets the sequence the NPC navigation path uses for speed calculation. Doesn't seem to have any visible effect on NPC movement.

name: SetNPCState
desc: Sets the state the NPC is in to help it decide on a ideal schedule.

name: SetSchedule
desc: Sets the NPC's current schedule.

name: SetTarget
desc: Sets the NPC's target to a player.(Used in some engine schedules)

name: StartEngineTask
desc: Forces the NPC to start an engine task, this has different results for every NPC.

name: StopMoving
desc: Resets the NPC's movement animation and velocity. Does not actually stop the NPC from moving.

name: UpdateEnemyMemory
desc: Force the NPC to update information on the supplied enemy, as if it had line of sight to it.

name: Add
desc: Adds the specified object to the panel.

name: AddText
desc: {{Deprecated|Does nothing}}

name: AlignBottom
desc: Aligns the panel on the bottom of its parent with the specified offset.

name: AlignLeft
desc: Aligns the panel on the left of its parent with the specified offset.

name: AlignRight
desc: Aligns the panel on the right of its parent with the specified offset.

name: AlignTop
desc: Aligns the panel on the top of its parent with the specified offset.

name: AlphaTo
desc: Uses animation to transition the current alpha value of a panel to a new alpha, over a set period of time and after a specified delay.

name: AnimationThinkInternal
desc: {{Internal}} Performs the per-frame operations required for panel animations.

name: AnimTail
desc: Returns the {{GlobalFunction|SysTime}} value when all animations for this panel object will end.

name: AppendText
desc: Appends text to a RichText element. This does not automatically add a new line.

name: ApplyGWEN
desc: Used by {{ClassFunction|Panel|LoadGWENFile}} and {{ClassFunction|Panel|LoadGWENString}} to apply a GWEN controls table to a panel object.

name: Center
desc: Centers the panel on its parent.

name: CenterHorizontal
desc: Centers the panel horizontally with specified fraction.

name: CenterVertical
desc: Centers the panel vertically with specified fraction.

name: ChildCount
desc: Returns the amount of children of the of panel.

name: ChildrenSize
desc: Returns the width and height of the space between the position of the panel (upper-left corner) and the max bound of the children panels (farthest reaching lower-right corner).

name: Clear
desc: Marks all of the panel's children for deletion.

name: ColorTo
desc: Fades panels color to specified one. It won't work unless panel has SetColor function.

name: Command
desc: Sends an action command signal to the panel. The response is handled by {{HookFunction|PANEL|ActionSignal}}.

name: ConVarChanged
desc: Updates a panel object's associated console variable. This must first be set up with {{GlobalFunction|Derma_Install_Convar_Functions}}, and have a ConVar set using {{ClassFunction|Panel|SetConVar}}.

name: ConVarNumberThink
desc: A think hook for [[Panel|panels]] using ConVars as a value. Call it in the Think hook. Sets the panel's value should the convar change.

name: ConVarStringThink
desc: A think hook for [[Panel|panels]] using ConVars as a value. Call it in the Think hook. Sets the panel's value should the convar change.

name: CopyBase
desc: Gets the size, position and dock state of the passed panel object, and applies it to this one.

name: CopyBounds
desc: Copies position and size of the panel.

name: CopyHeight
desc: Copies the height of the panel.

name: CopyPos
desc: Copies the position of the panel.

name: CopySelected
desc: Performs the "CONTROL + C" key combination effect ( Copy selection to clipboard ) on selected text.

name: CopyWidth
desc: Copies the width of the panel.

name: CursorPos
desc: Returns the cursor position relative to the top left of the panel.

name: CutSelected
desc: Performs the "CONTROL + X" ( delete text and copy it to clipboard buffer ) action on selected text.

name: DeleteCookie
desc: Deletes a cookie value using the panel's cookie name ( {{ClassFunction|Panel|GetCookieName}} ) and the passed extension.

name: DisableLerp
desc: Resets the panel object's {{ClassFunction|Panel|SetPos}} method and removes its animation table (''Panel.LerpAnim''). This effectively undoes the changes made by {{ClassFunction|Panel|LerpPositions}}.

name: Distance
desc: Returns the linear distance from the centre of this panel object and another.

name: DistanceFrom
desc: Returns the distance between the centre of this panel object and a specified point (local to the parent panel).

name: Dock
desc: Sets the dock type of the panel.

name: DockMargin
desc: Sets the dock margin of the panel.

name: DockPadding
desc: Sets the dock padding of the panel.

name: DoModal
desc: Makes the panel "lock" the screen until it is removed.

name: DragClick
desc: {{Internal}} Called by {{ClassFunction|Panel|DragMouseRelease}} when a user clicks one mouse button whilst dragging with another.

name: DragHover
desc: {{Internal}} Called by {{LibraryFunction|dragndrop|HoverThink}} to perform actions on an object that is dragged and hovered over another.

name: DragHoverClick
desc: Called when an object is dragged and hovered over this panel for 0.1 seconds. This is used by DPropertySheet}} and {{Type|DTree, for example to expand the tree when an object is hovered over it.

name: DragHoverEnd
desc: {{Internal}} Called to end a drag and hover action. This resets the panel's {{HookFunction|PANEL|PaintOver}} method, and is primarily used by {{LibraryFunction|dragndrop|StopDragging}}.

name: DragMousePress
desc: Called to inform the {{Lib|dragndrop}} library that a mouse button is being held down on a panel object.

name: DragMouseRelease
desc: Called to inform the {{Lib|dragndrop}} library that a mouse button has been depressed on a panel object.

name: DrawDragHover
desc: {{Internal}} Called to draw the drop target when an object is being dragged across another. See {{ClassFunction|Panel|SetDropTarget}}.

name: DrawFilledRect
desc: Draws a coloured rectangle to fill the panel object this method is called on. The colour is set using {{LibraryFunction|surface|SetDrawColor}}. This should only be called within the object's {{HookFunction|PANEL|Paint}} or {{HookFunction|PANEL|PaintOver}} hooks, as a shortcut for {{LibraryFunction|surface|DrawRect}}.

name: DrawOutlinedRect
desc: Draws a hollow rectangle the size of the panel object this method is called on, with a border width of 1 px. The border colour is set using {{LibraryFunction|surface|SetDrawColor}}. This should only be called within the object's {{HookFunction|PANEL|Paint}} or {{HookFunction|PANEL|PaintOver}} hooks, as a shortcut for {{LibraryFunction|surface|DrawOutlinedRect}}.

name: DrawSelections
desc: Used to draw the magenta highlight colour of a panel object when it is selected. This should be called in the object's {{HookFunction|PANEL|PaintOver}} hook. Once this is implemented, the highlight colour will be displayed only when the object is selectable and selected. This is achieved using {{ClassFunction|Panel|SetSelectable}} and {{ClassFunction|Panel|SetSelected}} respectively.

name: DrawTextEntryText
desc: Used to draw the text in a DTextEntry}} within a derma skin. This should be called within the {{HookFunction|SKIN|PaintTextEntry skin hook.

name: DrawTexturedRect
desc: Draws a textured rectangle to fill the panel object this method is called on. The texture is set using {{LibraryFunction|surface|SetTexture}} or {{LibraryFunction|surface|SetMaterial}}. This should only be called within the object's {{HookFunction|PANEL|Paint}} or {{HookFunction|PANEL|PaintOver}} hooks, as a shortcut for {{LibraryFunction|surface|DrawTexturedRect}}.

name: Droppable
desc: Makes this panel dropable. This is used with {{ClassFunction|Panel|Receiver}} to create drag and drop events.

name: DroppedOn
desc: For override. Called when this panel is dropped onto other panel.

name: EndBoxSelection
desc: Completes a box selection. If the end point of the selection box is within the selection canvas, mouse capture is disabled for the panel object, and the selected state of each child object within the selection box is toggled.

name: Exec
desc: {{Internal}} Used to run commands within a DHTML window.

name: Find
desc: Finds a panel in its children(and sub children) with the given name.

name: FocusNext
desc: Focuses the next panel in the focus queue.

name: FocusPrevious
desc: Focuses the previous panel in the focus queue.

name: GetAlpha
desc: Returns the alpha multiplier for this panel.

name: GetBounds
desc: Returns the position and size of the panel.

name: GetCaretPos
desc: Returns the position/offset of the caret (or text cursor) in a text-based panel object.

name: GetChild
desc: Gets a child by its index.

name: GetChildPosition
desc: Gets a child object's position relative to this panel object. The number of levels is not relevant; the child may have many parents between itself and the object on which the method is called.

name: GetChildrenInRect
desc: Returns a table of all visible, selectable children of the panel object that lie at least partially within the specified rectangle.

name: GetClassName
desc: Returns the class name of the panel.

name: GetClosestChild
desc: Returns the child of this panel object that is closest to the specified point. The point is relative to the object on which the method is called. The distance the child is from this point is also returned.

name: GetContentSize
desc: Gets the size of the content/children within a panel object.

name: GetCookie
desc: Gets the value of a cookie stored by the panel object. This can also be done with {{LibraryFunction|cookie|GetString}}, using the panel's cookie name, a fullstop, and then the actual name of the cookie.

name: GetCookieName
desc: Gets the name the panel uses to store cookies. This is set with {{ClassFunction|Panel|SetCookieName}}.

name: GetCookieNumber
desc: Gets the value of a cookie stored by the panel object, as a number. This can also be done with {{LibraryFunction|cookie|GetNumber}}, using the panel's cookie name, a fullstop, and then the actual name of the cookie.

name: GetDock
desc: Returns a dock enum for the panel's current docking type.

name: GetDockMargin
desc: Returns the docked margins of the panel. (set by {{ClassFunction|Panel|DockMargin}})

name: GetDockPadding
desc: Returns the docked padding of the panel. (set by {{ClassFunction|Panel|DockPadding}})

name: GetFont
desc: Returns the name of the font that the panel renders its text with.

name: GetHTMLMaterial
desc: Returns the panel's HTML material. Only works with Awesomium}}, {{Type|HTML}} and {{Type|DHTML panels that have been fully loaded.

name: GetNumLines
desc: Returns the number of lines in a RichText}}. You must wait a couple frames before calling this after using {{ClassFunction|Panel|AppendText}} or {{ClassFunction|Panel|SetText, otherwise it will return the number of text lines before the text change.

name: GetSelectedChildren
desc: Returns a table of all children of the panel object that are selected. This is recursive, and the returned table will include tables for any child objects that also have children. This means that not all first-level members in the returned table will be of type Panel.

name: GetSelectionCanvas
desc: Returns the panel object (''self'') if it has been enabled as a selection canvas. This is achieved using {{ClassFunction|Panel|SetSelectionCanvas}}.

name: GetSize
desc: Returns the size of the panel.

name: GetTall
desc: Returns the height of the panel.

name: GetText
desc: Returns the panel's text (where applicable).

name: GetTextInset
desc: Gets the left and top text margins of a text-based panel object, such as a DButton}} or {{Type|DLabel}}. This is set with {{ClassFunction|Panel|SetTextInset.

name: GetTextSize
desc: Gets the size of the text within a Label derived panel.

name: GetValidReceiverSlot
desc: Gets valid receiver slot of currently dragged panel.

name: GetValue
desc: Returns the value the panel holds.

name: GetWide
desc: Returns the width of the panel.

name: GetZPos
desc: Returns the Z position of the panel.

name: GoBack
desc: Goes back one page in the HTML panel's history if available.

name: GoForward
desc: Goes forward one page in the HTML panel's history if available.

name: GoToHistoryOffset
desc: Goes to the page in the HTML panel's history at the specified relative offset.

name: GotoTextEnd
desc: Causes a RichText element to scroll to the bottom of its text.

name: GotoTextStart
desc: Causes a RichText element to scroll to the top of its text.

name: GWEN_SetCheckboxText
desc: {{Internal}} Used by {{ClassFunction|Panel|ApplyGWEN}} to apply the ''CheckboxText'' property to a DCheckBoxLabel}}. This does exactly the same as {{ClassFunction|Panel|GWEN_SetText, but exists to cater for the seperate GWEN properties.

name: GWEN_SetControlName
desc: {{Internal}} Used by {{ClassFunction|Panel|ApplyGWEN}} to apply the ''ControlName'' property to a panel. This calls {{ClassFunction|Panel|SetName}}.

name: GWEN_SetDock
desc: {{Internal}} Used by {{ClassFunction|Panel|ApplyGWEN}} to apply the ''Dock'' property to a  panel object. This calls {{ClassFunction|Panel|Dock}}.

name: GWEN_SetHorizontalAlign
desc: {{Internal}} Used by {{ClassFunction|Panel|ApplyGWEN}} to apply the ''HorizontalAlign'' property to a  panel object. This calls {{ClassFunction|Panel|SetContentAlignment}}.

name: GWEN_SetMargin
desc: {{Internal}} Used by {{ClassFunction|Panel|ApplyGWEN}} to apply the ''Margin'' property to a  panel object. This calls {{ClassFunction|Panel|DockMargin}}.

name: GWEN_SetMax
desc: {{Internal}} Used by {{ClassFunction|Panel|ApplyGWEN}} to apply the ''Max'' property to a DNumberWang}}, {{Type|Slider}}, {{Type|DNumSlider}} or {{Type|DNumberScratch. This calls ''SetMax'' on one of the previously listed methods.

name: GWEN_SetMin
desc: {{Internal}} Used by {{ClassFunction|Panel|ApplyGWEN}} to apply the ''Min'' property to a DNumberWang}}, {{Type|Slider}}, {{Type|DNumSlider}} or {{Type|DNumberScratch. This calls ''SetMin'' on one of the previously listed methods.

name: GWEN_SetPosition
desc: {{Internal}} Used by {{ClassFunction|Panel|ApplyGWEN}} to apply the ''Position'' property to a  panel object. This calls {{ClassFunction|Panel|SetPos}}.

name: GWEN_SetSize
desc: {{Internal}} Used by {{ClassFunction|Panel|ApplyGWEN}} to apply the ''Size'' property to a  panel object. This calls {{ClassFunction|Panel|SetSize}}.

name: GWEN_SetText
desc: {{Internal}} Used by {{ClassFunction|Panel|ApplyGWEN}} to apply the ''Text'' property to a panel.

name: HasChildren
desc: Returns whenever the panel has child panels.

name: HasFocus
desc: Returns if the panel is focused.

name: HasHierarchicalFocus
desc: Returns if the panel or any of its children(sub children and so on) has the focus.

name: HasParent
desc: Returns whether the panel is a descendent of the given panel.

name: Hide
desc: Makes a panel invisible.

name: InsertClickableTextEnd
desc: Marks the end of a clickable text segment in a RichText}} element, started with {{ClassFunction|Panel|InsertClickableTextStart.

name: InsertClickableTextStart
desc: Starts the insertion of clickable text for a RichText}} element. Any text appended with {{ClassFunction|Panel|AppendText}} between this call and {{ClassFunction|Panel|InsertClickableTextEnd will become clickable text.

name: InsertColorChange
desc: Inserts a color change in a RichText}} element, which affects the color of all text added with {{ClassFunction|Panel|AppendText until another color change is applied.

name: InsertFade
desc: Begins a text fade for a RichText element where the last appended text segment is fully faded out after a specific amount of time, at a specific speed.

name: InvalidateChildren
desc: Invalidates the layout of this panel object and all its children. This will cause these objects to re-layout immediately, calling {{HookFunction|PANEL|PerformLayout}}. If you want to perform the layout in the next frame, you will have loop manually through all children, and call {{ClassFunction|Panel|InvalidateLayout}} on each.

name: InvalidateLayout
desc: Causes the panel to re-layout in the next frame. During the layout process  {{HookFunction|PANEL|PerformLayout}} will be called on the target panel.

name: InvalidateParent
desc: Invalidates the layout of the parent of this panel object. This will cause it to re-layout, calling {{HookFunction|PANEL|PerformLayout}}.

name: IsChildHovered
desc: Determines whether the mouse cursor is hovered over one of this panel object's children. This is a reverse process using {{LibraryFunction|vgui|GetHoveredPanel}}, and looks upward to find the parent.

name: IsDraggable
desc: Returns whether this panel is draggable ( if user is able to drag it ) or not.

name: IsDragging
desc: Returns whether this panel is currently being dragger or not.

name: IsEnabled
desc: Returns whether the the panel is enabled or disabled.

name: IsHovered
desc: Returns whether the mouse cursor is hovering over this panel or not

name: IsKeyboardInputEnabled
desc: Returns true if the panel can receive keyboard input.

name: IsLoading
desc: Determines whether or not a HTML}} or {{Type|DHTML element is currently loading a page.

name: IsMarkedForDeletion
desc: Returns if the panel is going to be deleted in the next frame.

name: IsMouseInputEnabled
desc: Returns true if the panel can receive mouse input.

name: IsMultiline
desc: Determines whether or not a text-based panel object, such as a DTextEntry}}, is in multi-line mode. This is set with {{ClassFunction|Panel|SetMultiline.

name: IsOurChild
desc: Returns whether the panel contains the given panel, recursively.

name: IsSelectable
desc: Determines if the panel object is selectable (like icons in the Spawn Menu, holding {{Key|Shift}}). This is set with {{ClassFunction|Panel|SetSelectable}}.

name: IsSelected
desc: Returns if the panel object is selected (like icons in the Spawn Menu, holding {{Key|Shift}}). This can be set in Lua using {{ClassFunction|Panel|SetSelected}}.

name: IsSelectionCanvas
desc: Determines if the panel object is a selection canvas or not. This is set with {{ClassFunction|Panel|SetSelectionCanvas}}.

name: IsVisible
desc: Returns if the panel is visible.

name: KillFocus
desc: Remove the focus from the panel.

name: LerpPositions
desc: Redefines the panel object's {{ClassFunction|Panel|SetPos}} method to operate using frame-by-frame linear interpolation (Lerp). When the panel's position is changed, it will move to the target position at the speed defined. You can undo this with {{ClassFunction|Panel|DisableLerp}}.

name: LoadControlsFromFile
desc: {{Stub}}

name: LoadControlsFromString
desc: {{Stub}}

name: LoadGWENFile
desc: Loads a .gwen file (created by GWEN Designer) and calls {{ClassFunction|Panel|LoadGWENString}} with the contents of the loaded file.

name: LoadGWENString
desc: Loads controls for the panel from a JSON string.

name: LoadTGAImage
desc: [[Category:TGAImage]]

name: LocalCursorPos
desc: Returns the cursor position local to the position of the panel (usually the upper-left corner).

name: LocalToScreen
desc: Gets the absolute screen position of the position specified relative to the panel.

name: MakePopup
desc: Focuses the panel and enables it to receive input.

name: MouseCapture
desc: Allows the panel to receive mouse input even if the mouse cursor is outside the bounds of the panel.

name: MoveAbove
desc: Places the panel above the passed panel with the specified offset.

name: MoveBelow
desc: Places the panel below the passed panel with the specified offset.

name: MoveBy
snippet: MoveBy(${1:number moveX},${2:number moveY},${3:number time},${4:number delay=0},${5:number ease=-1},${6:function callback})
desc: Moves the panel by the specified coordinates using animation.

name: MoveLeftOf
desc: Places the panel left to the passed panel with the specified offset.

name: MoveRightOf
desc: Places the panel right to the passed panel with the specified offset.

name: MoveTo
snippet: MoveTo(${1:number posX},${2:number posY},${3:number time},${4:number delay=0},${5:number ease=-1},${6:function callback})
desc: Moves the panel to the specified position using animation.

name: MoveToAfter
desc: Moves this panel object in front of the specified sibling (child of the same parent) in the render order, and shuffles up the Z-positions of siblings now behind.

name: MoveToBack
desc: Moves the panel object behind all other panels on screen. If the panel has been made a pop-up with {{ClassFunction|Panel|MakePopup}}, it will still draw in front of any panels that haven't.

name: MoveToBefore
desc: Moves this panel object behind the specified sibling (child of the same parent) in the render order, and shuffles up the Z-positions of siblings now in front.

name: MoveToFront
desc: Moves the panel in front of all other panels on screen. Unless the panel has been made a pop-up using {{ClassFunction|Panel|MakePopup}}, it will still draw behind any that have.

name: NewAnimation
desc: Creates a new animation for the panel object.

name: NewObject
desc: {{Internal}}

name: NewObjectCallback
desc: {{Internal}}

name: NoClipping
desc: Sets whenever all child drawings should be clipped within the panels bounds.

name: NumSelectedChildren
desc: Returns the number of children of the panel object that are selected. This is equivalent to calling {{ClassFunction|Panel|IsSelected}} on all child objects and counting the number of returns that are ''true''.

name: OpenURL
desc: [[Category:HTML]][[Category:Awesomium]]Instructs a HTML control to download and parse a HTML script using the passed URL.

name: PaintAt
desc: Paints a ghost copy of the panel at the given position.

name: PaintManual
desc: Paints the panel at its current position. To use this you must call {{ClassFunction|Panel|SetPaintedManually}}(true).

name: ParentToHUD
desc: Parents the panel to the HUD.

name: Paste
desc: {{Warning|Due to privacy concerns, this function has been disabled}}

name: PositionLabel
snippet: PositionLabel(${1:number lblWidth},${2:number x},${3:number y},${4:Panel lbl},${5:Panel panelObj})
desc: Sets the width and position of a DLabel and places the passed panel object directly to the right of it. Returns the ''y'' value of the bottom of the tallest object. The panel on which this method is run is not relevant; only the passed objects are affected.

name: PostMessage
desc: {{Deprecated|Only used in deprecated Derma controls.}}Sends a command to the panel.

name: Prepare
desc: {{Internal}}

name: Queue
desc: Enables the queue for panel animations. If enabled, the next new animation will begin after all current animations have ended. This must be called before {{ClassFunction|Panel|NewAnimation}} to work, and only applies to the next new animation. If you want to queue many, you must call this before each.

name: RebuildSpawnIcon
desc: Causes a SpawnIcon to rebuild its model image.

name: RebuildSpawnIconEx
desc: Re-renders a spawn icon with customized cam data.

name: Receiver
desc: Allows the panel to receive drag and drop events.

name: Refresh
desc: Refreshes the HTML panel's current page.

name: RequestFocus
desc: Attempts to obtain focus for this panel.

name: ResetAllFades
desc: Resets all text fades in a RichText}} element made with {{ClassFunction|Panel|InsertFade.

name: RunJavascript
desc: Runs/Executes a string as JavaScript code in [[:Category:DHTML|DHTML]] panel.

name: SaveUndoState
desc: {{Stub}}

name: ScreenToLocal
desc: Translates global screen coordinate to coordinates relative to the panel.

name: SelectAll
desc: Selects all items within a panel or object. For text-based objects, selects all text.

name: SelectAllOnFocus
desc: If called on a text entry, clicking the text entry for the first time will automatically select all of the text ready to be copied by the user.

name: SelectAllText
desc: Selects all the text in a panel object. Will not select non-text items; for this, use {{ClassFunction|Panel|SelectAll}}.

name: SelectNone
desc: Deselects all items in a panel object. For text-based objects, this will deselect all text.

name: SetAchievement
desc: Sets the achievement to be displayed by AchievementIcon.[[Category:AchievementIcon]]

name: SetActionFunction
desc: {{Deprecated|Only used in deprecated Derma controls.}}

name: SetAllowNonAsciiCharacters
desc: Configures a text input to allow user to type characters that are not included in the US-ASCII (7-bit ASCII) character set.

name: SetAlpha
desc: Sets the alpha multiplier for the panel

name: SetAnimationEnabled
desc: Enables or disables animations for the panel object by overriding the {{HookFunction|PANEL|AnimationThink}} hook to nil and back.

name: SetAutoDelete
desc: Sets whenever the panel should be removed if the parent was removed.

name: SetBGColor
snippet: SetBGColor(${1:number r or color},${2:number g},${3:number b},${4:number a})
desc: Sets the background color of a panel such as a RichText}}, {{Type|Label}} or {{Type|DColorCube.

name: SetBGColorEx
desc: {{Internal}}Sets the background color of the panel.

name: SetCaretPos
desc: Sets the position of the caret (or text cursor) in a text-based panel object.

name: SetCommand
desc: Sets the action signal command that's fired when a Button}} is clicked. The hook {{HookFunction|PANEL|ActionSignal is called as the click response.

name: SetContentAlignment
desc: Sets the alignment of the contents.

name: SetConVar
desc: Sets this panel's convar. When the convar changes this panel will update automatically.

name: SetCookie
desc: Stores a string in the named cookie using {{ClassFunction|Panel|GetCookieName}} as prefix.

name: SetCookieName
desc: Sets the panel's cookie name. Calls {{HookFunction|PANEL|LoadCookies}} if defined.

name: SetCursor
desc: Sets the appearance of the cursor.

name: SetDragParent
desc: Sets the drag parent.

name: SetDrawLanguageID
desc: Sets the visibility of the language selection box in a TextEntry when typing in non-English mode.

name: SetDrawLanguageIDAtLeft
desc: Sets where to draw the "current language" thingy.

name: SetDrawOnTop
desc: Draws this panel object in front of all others, including the spawn menu and main menu. This does not give focus to the panel, only rendering priority.

name: SetDropTarget
desc: Sets the target area for dropping when an object is being dragged around this panel using the {{Lib|dragndrop}} library.

name: SetEnabled
desc: Sets the enabled state of a disable-able panel object, such as a DButton}} or {{Type|DTextEntry.

name: SetExpensiveShadow
desc: Adds a shadow falling to the bottom right corner of the panel's text. This has no effect on panels that do not derive from Label.

name: SetFGColor
snippet: SetFGColor(${1:number r or color},${2:number g},${3:number b},${4:number a})
desc: Sets the foreground color of a panel.

name: SetFGColorEx
desc: {{Internal}}Sets the foreground color of the panel.

name: SetFocusTopLevel
desc: {{Stub}}

name: SetFontInternal
desc: Sets the font used to render this panel's text.

name: SetHeight
desc: Sets the height of the panel.

name: SetHTML
desc: [[Category:HTML]][[Category:Awesomium]]Allows you to set HTML code within a panel.

name: SetKeyBoardInputEnabled
desc: {{Deprecated|Alias of {{ClassFunction|Panel|SetKeyboardInputEnabled}}}}Enables or disables the keyboard input for the panel.

name: SetKeyboardInputEnabled
desc: Allows or disallows the panel to receive keyboard focus and input. This is recursively applied to all children.

name: SetMinimumSize
desc: Sets the minimum dimensions of the panel or object.

name: SetModel
desc: [[Category:ModelImage]][[Category:SpawnIcon]]Sets the model to be displayed by SpawnIcon.[[Category:SpawnIcon]]

name: SetMouseInputEnabled
desc: Enables or disables the mouse input for the panel.

name: SetMultiline
desc: Enables or disables the multi-line functionality of a text object, such as a DTextEntry.

name: SetName
desc: Sets the internal name of the panel.

name: SetPaintBackgroundEnabled
desc: Sets whenever all the default background of the panel should be drawn or not.

name: SetPaintBorderEnabled
desc: Sets whenever all the default border of the panel should be drawn or not.

name: SetPaintedManually
desc: Enables or disables painting of the panel manually with {{ClassFunction|Panel|PaintManual}}.

name: SetPaintFunction
desc: {{Deprecated|This function does nothing.}}

name: SetParent
desc: Sets the parent of the panel.

name: SetPlayer
desc: Used by AvatarImage to load an avatar for given player.[[Category:AvatarImage]]

name: SetPopupStayAtBack
desc: If this panel object has been made a popup with {{ClassFunction|Panel|MakePopup}}, this method will prevent it from drawing in front of other panels when it receives input focus.

name: SetPos
desc: Sets the position of the panel.

name: SetRenderInScreenshots
desc: Sets whenever the panel should be rendered in the next screenshot.

name: SetSelectable
desc: Sets whether the panel object can be selected or not (like icons in the Spawn Menu, holding {{Key|Shift}}). If enabled, this will affect the function of a DButton}} whilst {{Key|Shift}} is pressed. {{ClassFunction|Panel|SetSelected can be used to select/deselect the object.

name: SetSelected
desc: Sets the selected state of a selectable panel object. This functionality is set with {{ClassFunction|Panel|SetSelectable}} and checked with {{ClassFunction|Panel|IsSelectable}}.

name: SetSelectionCanvas
desc: Enables the panel object for selection (much like the spawn menu).

name: SetSize
desc: Sets the size of the panel.

name: SetSkin
desc: Sets the derma skin that the panel object will use, and refreshes all panels with {{LibraryFunction|derma|RefreshSkins}}.

name: SetSpawnIcon
desc: [[Category:ModelImage]][[Category:SpawnIcon]]Sets the [[Silkicons|silkicon]] of a panel object such as a SpawnIcon}} and {{Type|ModelImage.

name: SetSteamID
desc: Used by AvatarImage panels to load an avatar by its 64-bit Steam ID (community ID).[[Category:AvatarImage]]

name: SetTall
desc: Sets height of a panel. An alias of {{ClassFunction|Panel|SetHeight}}.

name: SetTerm
desc: Removes the panel after given time in seconds.

name: SetText
desc: Sets the text value of a panel object containing text, such as a Label}}, {{Type|TextEntry}} or {{Type|RichText}} and their derivatives, such as {{Type|DLabel}}, {{Type|DTextEntry}} or {{Type|DButton.

name: SetTextInset
desc: Sets the left and top text margins of a text-based panel object, such as a DButton}} or {{Type|DLabel.

name: SetToFullHeight
desc: Sets the height of a RichText element to accommodate the text inside.

name: SetToolTip
desc: {{Deprecated|Alias of {{ClassFunction|Panel|SetTooltip}}.}}

name: SetTooltip
desc: Sets the tooltip to be displayed when a player hovers over the panel object with their cursor.

name: SetToolTipPanel
desc: {{Deprecated|Alias of {{ClassFunction|Panel|SetTooltipPanel}}.}}

name: SetTooltipPanel
desc: Sets the panel object to be displayed as a tooltip when a player hovers over the panel object with their cursor.

name: SetURL
desc: [[Category:DLabelURL]][[Category:URLLabel]]Sets the URL of a link-based panel such as DLabelURL.

name: SetVerticalScrollbarEnabled
desc: Sets the visibility of the vertical scrollbar.

name: SetVisible
desc: Sets the "visibility" of the panel.

name: SetWide
desc: Sets width of a panel. An alias of {{ClassFunction|Panel|SetWidth}}.

name: SetWidth
desc: Sets the width of the panel.

name: SetWorldClicker
desc: This makes it so that when you're hovering over this panel you can `click` on the world. Your viewmodel will aim etc.

name: SetWrap
desc: Sets whether text wrapping should be enabled or disabled on Label}} and {{Type|DLabel panels.

name: SetZPos
desc: Sets the panels z position which determines the rendering order.

name: Show
desc: Makes a panel visible.

name: SizeTo
snippet: SizeTo(${1:number sizeW=0},${2:number sizeH=0},${3:number time},${4:number delay=0},${5:number ease=-1},${6:function callback})
desc: Uses animation to resize the panel to the specified size.

name: SizeToChildren
desc: Resizes the panel to fit the bounds of its children.

name: SizeToContents
desc: Resizes the panel so that its width and height fit all of the content inside.

name: SizeToContentsX
desc: Resizes the panel object's width to accommodate all child objects/contents.

name: SizeToContentsY
desc: Resizes the panel object's height to accommodate all child objects/contents.

name: SlideDown
desc: Slides the panel in from above.

name: SlideUp
desc: Slides the panel out to the top.

name: StartBoxSelection
desc: Begins a box selection, enables mouse capture for the panel object, and sets the start point of the selection box to the mouse cursor's position, relative to this object. For this to work, either the object or its parent must be enabled as a selection canvas. This is set using {{ClassFunction|Panel|SetSelectionCanvas}}.

name: StopLoading
desc: Stops the loading of the HTML panel's current page.

name: StretchBottomTo
desc: Resizes the panel object's height so that its bottom is aligned with the top of the passed panel. An offset greater than zero will reduce the panel's height to leave a gap between it and the passed panel.

name: StretchRightTo
desc: Resizes the panel object's width so that its right edge is aligned with the left of the passed panel. An offset greater than zero will reduce the panel's width to leave a gap between it and the passed panel.

name: StretchToParent
desc: Sets the dimensions of the panel to fill its parent. It will only stretch in directions that aren't nil.

name: ToggleSelection
desc: Toggles the selected state of a selectable panel object. This functionality is set with {{ClassFunction|Panel|SetSelectable}} and checked with {{ClassFunction|Panel|IsSelectable}}. To check whether the object is selected or not, {{ClassFunction|Panel|IsSelected}} is used.

name: ToggleVisible
desc: Toggles the visibility of a panel and all its children.

name: Undo
desc: {{Stub}}[[Category:TextEntry]]

name: UnselectAll
desc: Recursively deselects this panel object and all of its children. This will cascade to all child objects at every level below the parent.

name: UpdateHTMLTexture
desc: {{Stub}}[[Category:HTML]]

name: Valid
desc: {{Deprecated|Use {{ClassFunction|Panel|IsValid}} instead.}}Returns if a given panel is valid or not.

name: Chase
desc: If you created your path with type "Chase" this functions should be used in place of {{ClassFunction|PathFollower|Update}} to cause the bot to chase the specified entity.

name: Compute
desc: Compute shortest path from bot to 'goal' via A* algorithm.

name: FirstSegment
desc: Returns the first segment of the path.

name: GetAge
desc: Returns the age since the path was built

name: GetAllSegments
desc: Returns all of the segments of the given path.

name: GetClosestPosition
desc: The closest position along the path to a position

name: GetCurrentGoal
desc: Returns the current goal data. Can return nil if the current goal is invalid, for example immediately after {{ClassFunction|PathFollower|Update}}.

name: GetCursorData
desc: Returns the cursor data

name: GetCursorPosition
desc: Returns the current progress along the path

name: GetEnd
desc: Returns the path end position

name: GetPositionOnPath
desc: Returns the vector position of distance along path

name: Invalidate
desc: Invalidates the current path

name: LastSegment
desc: Returns the last segment of the path.

name: MoveCursor
desc: Moves the cursor by give distance.

name: MoveCursorTo
desc: Sets the cursor position to given distance.

name: MoveCursorToClosestPosition
desc: Moves the cursor of the path to the closest position compared to given vector.

name: MoveCursorToEnd
desc: Moves the cursor to the end of the path

name: MoveCursorToStart
desc: Moves the cursor to the end of the path

name: ResetAge
desc: Resets the age which is retrieved by {{ClassFunction|PathFollower|GetAge}} to 0.

name: SetGoalTolerance
desc: How close we can get to the goal to call it done

name: SetMinLookAheadDistance
desc: Sets minimum range movement goal must be along path

name: Update
desc: Move the bot along the path.

name: AddAngleVelocity
desc: Adds the specified velocity to the current.

name: AddGameFlag
desc: Adds one or more bit flags.

name: AddVelocity
desc: Adds the specified velocity to the current.

name: ApplyForceCenter
desc: Applies the specified force to the physics object. (in Newtons)

name: ApplyForceOffset
desc: Applies the specified force on the physics object at the specified position

name: ClearGameFlag
desc: Removes one of more specified flags.

name: ComputeShadowControl
desc: Allows you to move a PhysObj to a point and angle in 3D space.

name: EnableCollisions
desc: Sets whenever the physics object should not collide with anything.

name: EnableDrag
desc: Sets whenever the physics object should be affected by drag.

name: EnableGravity
desc: Sets whenever the physobject should be affected by gravity

name: EnableMotion
desc: Sets whenever the physobject should be able to move or not.

name: GetAABB
desc: Returns the mins and max of the physics object.

name: GetDamping
desc: Returns the linear and angular damping of the physics object.

name: GetEnergy
desc: Returns the kinetic energy of the physobject.

name: GetInertia
desc: Returns the directional inertia of the physics object.

name: GetInvInertia
desc: Returns the inverted inertia.

name: GetInvMass
desc: Returns 1 divided by the entities mass.

name: GetMass
desc: Returns the mass of the physics object.

name: GetMassCenter
desc: Returns the center of mass of the physics object as a local vector.

name: GetMesh
desc: Returns a table of {{Struct|MeshVertex}}s where each 3 vertices represent a triangle.

name: GetMeshConvexes
desc: Returns a structured table, the physics mesh of the physics object.

name: GetRotDamping
desc: Returns the rotation damping of the physics object.

name: GetSpeedDamping
desc: Returns the speed damping of the physics object.

name: GetStress
desc: Returns the stress of the entity.

name: GetSurfaceArea
desc: Returns the surface area of the physics object in source-units.

name: HasGameFlag
desc: Returns whenever the specified flag(s) is/are set.

name: IsAsleep
desc: Returns whenever the physics object is sleeping eg. not active.

name: IsCollisionEnabled
desc: Returns whenever the entity is able to collide or not.

name: IsDragEnabled
desc: Returns whenever the entity is affected by drag.

name: IsGravityEnabled
desc: Returns whenever the entity is affected by gravity.

name: IsMotionEnabled
desc: Returns if the physics object can move itself (by velocity, acceleration)

name: IsMoveable
desc: Returns whenever the entity is able to move.

name: IsPenetrating
desc: Returns whenever the physics object is penetrating another physics object.

name: LocalToWorld
desc: Mapping a vector in local frame of the physics object to world frame.

name: LocalToWorldVector
desc: Rotate a vector from the local frame of the physics object to world frame.

name: OutputDebugInfo
desc: Prints debug info about the state of the physics object to the console.

name: RecheckCollisionFilter
desc: Call this when the collision filter conditions change due to this object's state (e.g. changing solid type or collision group)

name: RotateAroundAxis
desc: A convinience function for {{ClassFunction|Angle|RotateAroundAxis}}.

name: SetBuoyancyRatio
desc: Sets the buoyancy ratio.

name: SetDamping
desc: Sets the linear and angular damping of the physics object.

name: SetDragCoefficient
desc: Modifies how much drag affects the object.

name: SetInertia
desc: Sets the directional inertia.

name: SetMass
desc: Sets the mass of the physobject.

name: SetMaterial
desc: Sets the material of the physobject.

name: SetPos
desc: Sets the position of the physobject.

name: SetVelocityInstantaneous
desc: Sets the velocity of the physics object.

name: Sleep
desc: Make the physics object sleep.

name: UpdateShadow
desc: Unlike {{ClassFunction|PhysObj|SetPos}} and {{ClassFunction|PhysObj|SetAngles}}, this allows the movement of a physobj while leaving physics interactions intact.

name: Wake
desc: Wakes the physics object. See also {{ClassFunction|PhysObj|Sleep}}

name: WorldToLocal
desc: Converts a vector to a relative to the physics object coordinate system.

name: WorldToLocalVector
desc: Rotate a vector from the world frame to the local frame of the physics object.

name: AccountID
desc: Returns the player's AccountID aka 32bit SteamID.

name: AddCleanup
desc: Adds an entity to the players clean up list.

name: AddCount
desc: Adds an entity to the total count of entities of same class.

name: AddDeaths
desc: Add a certain amount to the player's death count

name: AddFrags
desc: Add a certain amount to the player's frag count (or kills count)

name: AddFrozenPhysicsObject
desc: Adds a entity to the players list of frozen objects.

name: AddPlayerOption
snippet: AddPlayerOption(${1:string name},${2:number timeout},${3:function vote callback},${4:function draw callback})
desc: Sets up the voting system for the player.

name: AddVCDSequenceToGestureSlot
desc: Plays a sequence directly from a sequence number, similar to {{ClassFunction|Player|AnimRestartGesture}}. This function has the advantage to play sequences that haven't been bound to an existing {{Enum|ACT}}

name: Alive
desc: Checks if the player is alive.

name: AllowFlashlight
desc: Sets if the player can toggle his flashlight. Function exists on both the server and client but has no effect when ran on the client.

name: AllowImmediateDecalPainting
desc: Lets the player spray his decal without delay

name: AnimResetGestureSlot
desc: Resets player gesture in selected slot.

name: AnimRestartGesture
desc: Restart a gesture on a player, within a gesture slot.

name: AnimRestartMainSequence
desc: Restarts the main animation on the player, has the same effect as calling {{ClassFunction|Entity|SetCycle}}( 0 ).

name: AnimSetGestureSequence
desc: Sets the sequence of the animation playing in the given gesture slot.

name: AnimSetGestureWeight
desc: Sets the weight of the animation playing in the given gesture slot.

name: Armor
desc: Returns the player's armor.

name: Ban
desc: Bans the player from the server for a certain amount of minutes.

name: CanUseFlashlight
desc: Returns true if the player's flashlight hasn't been disabled by {{ClassFunction| Player|AllowFlashlight}}

name: ChatPrint
desc: Prints a string to the chatbox of the client.

name: CheckLimit
desc: Checks if the limit is hit or not. If it is, it will throw a notification saying so.

name: ConCommand
desc: Runs the concommand on the player. This does not work on bots.

name: CreateRagdoll
desc: Creates the player's ragdoll entity.

name: CrosshairDisable
desc: Disables a players crosshair.

name: CrosshairEnable
desc: Enables crosshair of player.

name: Crouching
desc: Returns whether the player is crouching or not

name: Deaths
desc: Returns the player's death count

name: DebugInfo
desc: Prints the players' name and position to the console.

name: DetonateTripmines
desc: Detonates all tripmines belonging to the player.

name: DoAnimationEvent
desc: Sends a third person animation event to the player.

name: DoAttackEvent
desc: Starts the player's attack animation. The attack animation is determined by the weapon's HoldType.

name: DoCustomAnimEvent
desc: Sends a specified third person animation event to the player.

name: DoReloadEvent
desc: Sends a third person reload animation event to the player.

name: DoSecondaryAttack
desc: Sends a third person secondary fire animation event to the player.

name: DrawViewModel
desc: Show/Hide the player's weapon's viewmodel.

name: DrawWorldModel
desc: Show/Hide the player's weapon's worldmodel.

name: DropNamedWeapon
desc: Drops the players' weapon of a specific class.

name: DropObject
desc: Drops any object the player is currently holding with either gravitygun or +Use (E key)

name: DropWeapon
desc: Forces the player to drop the specified weapon

name: EnterVehicle
desc: Enters the player into specified vehicle

name: EquipSuit
desc: Equips the player with the HEV suit.

name: ExitVehicle
desc: Makes the player exit the vehicle if they're in one.

name: Flashlight
desc: Enables/Disables the player's flashlight

name: FlashlightIsOn
desc: Returns true if the player's flashlight is on.

name: Frags
desc: Returns the amount of kills a player has.

name: Freeze
desc: Freeze/Unfreezes the player. Frozen players cannot move, attack or turn around. Keybindings are still called. Similar to {{ClassFunction|Player|Lock}}.

name: GetAllowFullRotation
desc: Returns true if the players' model is allowed to rotate around the pitch and roll axis.

name: GetAllowWeaponsInVehicle
desc: Returns whether the player is allowed to use his weapons in a vehicle or not.

name: GetAmmoCount
desc: Gets the amount of ammo the player has.

name: GetAvoidPlayers
desc: Gets if the player will be pushed out of nocollided players.

name: GetCanWalk
desc: Returns true if the player is able to walk using the (default) alt key.

name: GetCanZoom
desc: Determines whenever the player is allowed to use the zoom functionality.

name: GetClassID
desc: Returns the player's class id.

name: GetCount
desc: Gets total count of entities of same class.

name: GetCrouchedWalkSpeed
desc: Gets the crouched walk speed.

name: GetCurrentCommand
desc: Returns the last command which was sent by the specified player. Can only be used in a [[:Category:Predicted_Hooks|Predicted Hook]].

name: GetCurrentViewOffset
desc: Gets the '''actual''' view offset which equals the difference between the players actual position and their view when standing.

name: GetDrivingEntity
desc: Gets the entity the player is currently driving.

name: GetDrivingMode
desc: Returns driving mode of the player. See [[Entity Driving]].

name: GetDuckSpeed
desc: Returns a player's duck speed (in seconds)

name: GetEyeTrace
desc: Returns a table with information of what the player is looking at.

name: GetEyeTraceNoCursor
desc: Returns the trace according to the players view direction, ignoring their mouse ( Holding C and moving the mouse in Sandbox ).

name: GetFOV
desc: Returns the FOV of the player.

name: GetFriendStatus
desc: Returns the steam "relationship" towards the player.

name: GetHands
desc: Gets the hands entity of a player

name: GetHoveredWidget
desc: Returns the widget the player is hovering with his mouse.

name: GetHull
desc: Gets the bottom base and the top base size of the player's hull.

name: GetHullDuck
desc: Gets the bottom base and the top base size of the player's crouch hull.

name: GetInfo
desc: Retrieves the value of a client-side ConVar}}. The {{Type|ConVar must have a [[Enums/FCVAR|FCVAR_USERINFO]] flag for this to work.

name: GetInfoNum
desc: Retrieves the numeric value of a client-side convar, returns nil if value is not convertible to a number. The ConVar must have a [[Enums/FCVAR|FCVAR_USERINFO]] flag for this to work.

name: GetJumpPower
desc: Returns the jump power of the player

name: GetLaggedMovementValue
desc: Returns the timescale multiplier of the player movement.

name: GetNoCollideWithTeammates
desc: Returns whenever the player is set not to collide with their teammates.

name: GetObserverMode
desc: Returns the the observer mode of the player

name: GetObserverTarget
desc: Returns the entity the player is currently observing.

name: GetPData
desc: Returns a player's PData from the server's or client's SQL database. ( sv.db and cl.db respectively ) It is not networked!

name: GetPlayerColor
desc: Returns a player model's color. The part of the model that is colored is determined by the model itself, and is different for each model. The format is Vector(r,g,b), and each color should be between 0 and 1.

name: GetPlayerInfo
desc: Returns a table containing player information.

name: GetPreferredCarryAngles
desc: {{Stub}}

name: GetPressedWidget
desc: Returns the widget entity the player is using.

name: GetPunchAngle
desc: {{Deprecated|You should use {{ClassFunction|Player|GetViewPunchAngles}} instead.}}

name: GetRagdollEntity
desc: Returns players death ragdoll

name: GetRunSpeed
desc: Returns the amount of speed the player runs at.

name: GetStepSize
desc: Returns the maximum height player can step onto.

name: GetTimeoutSeconds
desc: Returns the number of seconds that the player has been timing out for. You can check if a player is timing out with {{ClassFunction|Player|IsTimingOut}}.

name: GetTool
desc: Returns TOOL table of players current tool, or of the one specified.

name: GetUnDuckSpeed
desc: Returns a player's unduck speed (in seconds)

name: GetUserGroup
desc: Returns the player's user group.

name: GetVehicle
desc: Gets the vehicle the player is driving, returns NULL ENTITY if the player is not driving.

name: GetViewEntity
desc: Returns the entity the player is using to see from (such as the player itself, the camera, or another entity).

name: GetViewModel
desc: Returns the player's view model entity by the index.

name: GetViewOffset
desc: Returns the view offset of the player which equals the difference between the players actual position and their view.

name: GetViewOffsetDucked
desc: Returns the view offset of the player which equals the difference between the players actual position and their view when ducked.

name: GetViewPunchAngles
desc: Returns players screen punch effect angle.

name: GetWalkSpeed
desc: Returns a player's walk speed

name: GetWeapon
desc: Returns the weapon for the specified class

name: GetWeaponColor
desc: Returns a player's weapon color. The part of the model that is colored is determined by the model itself, and is different for each model. The format is Vector(r,g,b), and each color should be between 0 and 1.

name: GetWeapons
desc: Returns a table of the player's weapons.

name: Give
desc: Give the player a weapon

name: GiveAmmo
desc: Gives ammo to a player

name: GodDisable
desc: Disables god mode on the player.

name: GodEnable
desc: Enables god mode on the player.

name: HasGodMode
desc: Returns whether the player has god mode or not, contolled by {{ClassFunction|Player|GodEnable}} and {{ClassFunction|Player|GodDisable}}.

name: HasWeapon
desc: Returns if the player has the specified weapon

name: InVehicle
desc: Returns if the player is in a vehicle

name: IPAddress
desc: Returns the player's IP address and connection port in ip:port form

name: IsAdmin
desc: Returns whether the player is an admin or not

name: IsBot
desc: Returns if the player is an bot or not

name: IsConnected
desc: Returns true from the point when the player is sending client info but not fully in the game until they disconnect.

name: IsDrivingEntity
desc: Used to find out if a player is currently 'driving' an entity (by which we mean 'right click > drive' ).

name: IsFrozen
desc: Returns whether the players movement is currently frozen, contolled by {{ClassFunction|Player|Freeze}}.

name: IsFullyAuthenticated
desc: Returns whether the player identity was confirmed by the steam network.

name: IsListenServerHost
desc: Returns if a player is the host of the current session.

name: IsMuted
desc: Returns whether or not the player is muted locally.

name: IsPlayingTaunt
desc: Returns true if the player is playing a taunt.

name: IsSpeaking
desc: Returns whenever the player is heard by the local player.

name: IsSuitEquipped
desc: Returns whenever the player is equipped with the suit item.

name: IsSuperAdmin
desc: Returns whether the player is a superadmin.

name: IsTimingOut
desc: Returns true if the player is timing out (i.e. is losing connection), false otherwise.

name: IsTyping
desc: Returns whether the player is typing in their chat.

name: IsUserGroup
desc: Returns true/false if the player is in specified group or not.

name: IsVoiceAudible
desc: Returns if the player can be heard by the local player.

name: IsWorldClicking
desc: Returns if the player is in the context menu.

name: KeyDownLast
desc: Gets whether a key was down one tick ago.

name: Kick
desc: Kicks the player from the server.

name: Kill
desc: Kills a player and calls {{HookFunction|GM|PlayerDeath}}.

name: KillSilent
desc: Kills a player without notifying the rest of the server.

name: LagCompensation
desc: This allows the server to mitigate the lag of the player by moving back all the entities that can be lag compensated to the time the player attacked with his weapon.

name: LastHitGroup
desc: Returns the hitgroup where the player was last hit.

name: LimitHit
desc: Shows "limit hit" notification in sandbox.

name: Lock
desc: Stops a player from using any inputs, such as moving and shooting. Similar to {{ClassFunction|Player|Freeze}} but the player remains frozen/locked after death.

name: MotionSensorPos
desc: Returns the position of a Kinect bone.

name: Name
desc: Returns the players name. Identical to {{ClassFunction|Player|Nick}} and {{ClassFunction|Player|GetName}}

name: Nick
desc: Returns the player's nickname

name: PacketLoss
desc: Returns the packet loss of the client. It is not networked so it only returns 0 when run clientside.

name: PhysgunUnfreeze
desc: Unfreezes the props player is looking at. This is essentially the same as pressing reload with the physics gun, including double press for unfreeze all.

name: PickupObject
desc: This makes the player hold ( same as pressing {{Key|E}} on a small prop ) the provided entity.

name: Ping
desc: Returns the player's ping to server.

name: PlayStepSound
desc: Plays the correct step sound according to what the player is staying on.

name: PrintMessage
desc: Displays a message either in their chat, console, or center of the screen. See also {{GlobalFunction|PrintMessage}}.

name: RemoveAllAmmo
desc: Removes all ammo from a certain player

name: RemoveAllItems
desc: Removes all weapons and ammonition from the player.

name: RemoveAmmo
desc: Removes the amount of the specified ammo from the player.

name: RemovePData
desc: Deletes a key from a player's data

name: RemoveSuit
desc: Strips the player's suit item.

name: ResetHull
desc: Resets both normal and duck hulls to their default values.

name: Say
desc: Forces the player to say whatever the first argument is. Works on bots too.

name: ScreenFade
desc: Fades the screen

name: SelectWeapon
desc: Sets the active weapon of the player by its class name.

name: SendHint
desc: Sends a hint to a player.

name: SendLua
desc: Executes a simple Lua string on the player.

name: SetActiveWeapon
desc: Sets the player's active weapon.

name: SetAllowFullRotation
desc: Set if the players' model is allowed to rotate around the pitch and roll axis.

name: SetAllowWeaponsInVehicle
desc: Allows player to use his weapons in a vehicle. You need to call this before entering a vehicle.

name: SetAmmo
desc: Sets the amount of of the specified ammo for the player.

name: SetArmor
desc: Sets the player armor to the argument.

name: SetAvoidPlayers
desc: Pushes the player away from another player whenever it's inside the other players bounding box.

name: SetCanWalk
desc: Set if the player should be allowed to walk using the (default) alt key.

name: SetCanZoom
desc: Sets whether the player can use the HL2 suit zoom ("+zoom" bind) or not.

name: SetClassID
desc: Sets the player's class id.

name: SetCrouchedWalkSpeed
desc: Sets the crouched walk speed multiplier.

name: SetCurrentViewOffset
desc: Sets the '''actual''' view offset which equals the difference between the players actual position and their view when standing.

name: SetDeaths
desc: Sets a player's death count

name: SetDrivingEntity
desc: {{Internal}}

name: SetDSP
desc: Applies the specified sound filter to the player.

name: SetDuckSpeed
desc: Sets how quickly a player ducks.

name: SetEyeAngles
desc: Sets the angle of the player's view (may rotate body too if angular difference is large)

name: SetFOV
desc: Set a player's FOV (Field Of View) over a certain amount of time.

name: SetFrags
desc: Sets a player's frags (kills)

name: SetHands
desc: Sets the hands entity of a player.

name: SetHoveredWidget
desc: Sets the widget that is currently hovered by the player's mouse.

name: SetHull
desc: Sets the mins and maxs of the AABB of the players collision.

name: SetHullDuck
desc: Sets the mins and maxs of the AABB of the players collision when ducked.

name: SetJumpPower
desc: Sets the jump power, eg. the velocity the player will applied to when he jumps.

name: SetLaggedMovementValue
desc: Slows down the player movement simulation by the timescale, this is used internally in the HL2 weapon stripping sequence.

name: SetMaxSpeed
desc: Sets the maximum speed which the player can move at.

name: SetMuted
desc: Sets if the player should be muted locally.

name: SetNoCollideWithTeammates
desc: Sets whenever the player should not collide with their teammates.

name: SetNoTarget
desc: Sets the players visibility towards NPCs.

name: SetObserverMode
desc: Sets the players observer mode.

name: SetPData
desc: Sets a player's PData from the server's or client's SQL database ( sv.db and cl.db respectively ), It is not networked!

name: SetPlayerColor
desc: Sets the player model's color. The part of the model that is colored is determined by the model itself, and is different for each model.

name: SetPressedWidget
desc: Sets the widget that is currently in use by the player's mouse.

name: SetRenderAngles
desc: Sets the render angles of a player.

name: SetRunSpeed
desc: Sets the run speed eg. the speed when sprinting.

name: SetStepSize
desc: Sets the maximum height a player can step onto without jumping.

name: SetSuppressPickupNotices
desc: Sets whenever to suppress the pickup notification for the player.

name: SetTeam
desc: Sets the player to the chosen team.

name: SetUnDuckSpeed
desc: Sets how quickly a player un-ducks

name: SetupHands
desc: Sets up the players view model hands. Calls {{HookFunction|GM|PlayerSetHandsModel}} to set the model of the hands.

name: SetUserGroup
desc: Sets the usergroup of the player.

name: SetViewEntity
desc: Attaches the players view to the position and angles of the specified entity.

name: SetViewOffset
desc: Sets the '''desired''' view offset which equals the difference between the players actual position and their view when standing.

name: SetViewOffsetDucked
desc: Sets the '''desired''' view offset which equals the difference between the players actual position and their view when crouching.

name: SetViewPunchAngles
desc: Sets client's view punch. See {{ClassFunction|Player|ViewPunch}}

name: SetWalkSpeed
desc: Sets the walk speed eg. the speed when normally walking.

name: SetWeaponColor
desc: Sets the player weapon's color. The part of the model that is colored is determined by the model itself, and is different for each model.

name: ShouldDrawLocalPlayer
desc: Polls the engine to request if the player should be drawn at the time the function is called.

name: ShouldDropWeapon
desc: Sets whether the player's current weapon should drop on death.

name: ShowProfile
desc: Opens the player steam profile page in the steam overlay browser.

name: SimulateGravGunDrop
desc: Signals the entity that it was dropped by the gravity gun.

name: SimulateGravGunPickup
desc: Signals the entity that it was picked up by the gravity gun. This call is only required if you want to simulate the situation of picking up objects.

name: Spectate
desc: Sets the spectate mode of the player.

name: SpectateEntity
desc: Makes the player spectate the entity

name: SprayDecal
desc: Makes a player spray their decal.

name: SprintDisable
desc: Disables the sprint on the player. Not working! Use {{ClassFunction|Player|SetRunSpeed}} instead.

name: SprintEnable
desc: Enables the sprint on the player. Not working! Use {{ClassFunction|Player|SetRunSpeed}} instead.

name: StartSprinting
desc: {{Stub}}{{Validate}}Currently does nothing

name: StartWalking
desc: {{Stub}}{{Validate}}Currently does nothing

name: SteamID
desc: Returns the player's SteamID. In singleplayer, this will be STEAM_ID_PENDING serverside.

name: SteamID64
desc: Returns the player's 64bit SteamID aka CommunityID.

name: StopSprinting
desc: {{Stub}}{{Validate}}Currently does nothing

name: StopWalking
desc: {{Stub}}{{Validate}}Currently does nothing

name: StopZooming
desc: Turns off the zoom mode of the player.

name: StripAmmo
desc: Removes all ammo from the player.

name: StripWeapon
desc: Removes the specified weapon class from a certain player

name: StripWeapons
desc: Removes all weapons from a certain player

name: SuppressHint
desc: Prevents a hint from showing up.

name: SwitchToDefaultWeapon
desc: Attempts to switch the player weapon to the one specified in the "cl_defaultweapon" convar, if the player does not own the specified weapon nothing will happen.

name: Team
desc: Returns the player's team ID.

name: TimeConnected
desc: Returns the time in second since the player connected.

name: TraceHullAttack
snippet: TraceHullAttack(${1:Vector startPos},${2:Vector endPos},${3:Vector mins},${4:Vector maxs},${5:number damage},${6:Vector damageFlags},${7:number damageForce},${8:boolean damageAllNPCs})
desc: Performs a trace hull and applies damage to the entities hit, returns the first entity hit.

name: TranslateWeaponActivity
desc: Translates {{Enum|ACT}} according to the holdtype of players currently held weapon.

name: UnfreezePhysicsObjects
desc: Unfreezes all objects the player has frozen with their Physics Gun. Same as double pressing R while holding Physics Gun.

name: UniqueID
desc: {{Warning|'''This function has collisions,''' where more than one player has the same UniqueID. It is '''highly''' recommended to use {{ClassFunction|Player|AccountID}}, {{ClassFunction|Player|SteamID}} or {{ClassFunction|Player|SteamID64}} instead, which are guaranteed to be unique to each player.}}

name: UniqueIDTable
desc: Returns a table that will stay allocated for the specific player between connects until the server shuts down. Note, that this table is not synchronized between client and server.

name: UnLock
desc: Unlocks the player movement if locked previously.

name: UnSpectate
desc: Stops the player from spectating another entity.

name: UserID
desc: Returns the player's ID.

name: ViewPunch
desc: Simulates a push on the client's screen.

name: ViewPunchReset
desc: Resets the player's view punch ( {{ClassFunction|Player|ViewPunch}} ) effect back to normal.

name: VoiceVolume
desc: Returns the players voice volume as a normal number. Doesn't work on local player unless the voice_loopback convar is set to 1.

name: GetBrightness
desc: Returns the brightness of the ProjectedTexture, which was previously set by {{ClassFunction|ProjectedTexture|SetBrightness}}

name: GetEnableShadows
desc: Returns whether shadows are enabled for this ProjectedTexture, which was previously set by {{ClassFunction|ProjectedTexture|SetEnableShadows}}

name: GetFarZ
desc: Returns the projection distance of the ProjectedTexture, which was previously set by {{ClassFunction|ProjectedTexture|SetFarZ}}

name: GetHorizontalFOV
desc: Returns the horizontal FOV of the ProjectedTexture, which was previously set by {{ClassFunction|ProjectedTexture|SetHorizontalFOV}} or {{ClassFunction|ProjectedTexture|SetFOV}}

name: GetNearZ
desc: Returns the NearZ value of the ProjectedTexture, which was previously set by {{ClassFunction|ProjectedTexture|SetNearZ}}

name: GetOrthographic
desc: Returns the current orthographic settings of the Projected Texture. To set these values, use {{ClassFunction|ProjectedTexture|SetOrthographic}}.

name: GetTexture
desc: Returns the texture of the ProjectedTexture, which was previously set by {{ClassFunction|ProjectedTexture|SetTexture}}

name: GetTextureFrame
desc: Returns the texture frame of the ProjectedTexture, which was previously set by {{ClassFunction|ProjectedTexture|SetTextureFrame}}

name: GetVerticalFOV
desc: Returns the vertical FOV of the ProjectedTexture, which was previously set by {{ClassFunction|ProjectedTexture|SetVerticalFOV}} or {{ClassFunction|ProjectedTexture|SetFOV}}

name: SetAngles
desc: Sets the angles (direction) of the projected texture.

name: SetBrightness
desc: Sets the brightness of the projected texture.

name: SetEnableShadows
desc: Enable or disable shadows cast from the projected texture.

name: SetFarZ
desc: Sets the distance at which the projected texture ends.

name: SetFOV
desc: Sets the angle of projection.

name: SetHorizontalFOV
desc: Sets the horizontal angle of projection without affecting the vertical angle.

name: SetNearZ
desc: Sets the distance at which the projected texture begins its projection.

name: SetOrthographic
snippet: SetOrthographic(${1:boolean orthographic},${2:number left},${3:number top},${4:number right},${5:number bottom})
desc: Changes the current projected texture between orthographic and perspective projection.

name: SetTexture
desc: Sets the texture to be projected.

name: SetTextureFrame
desc: For animated textures, this will choose which frame in the animation will be projected.

name: SetVerticalFOV
desc: Sets the vertical angle of projection without affecting the horizontal angle.

name: Update
desc: Updates the Projected Light and applies all previously set parameters.

name: AddTask
desc: {{Stub}} Adds a task to the schedule.

name: EngTask
desc: Adds an engine task to the schedule.

name: GetTask
desc: Returns the task at the given index.

name: Init
desc: {{Internal}} Initialises the Schedule. Called by {{LibraryFunction|ai_schedule|New}} when the Schedule is created.

name: NumTasks
desc: Returns the number of tasks in the schedule.

name: Pop
desc: Pop an item from the stack

name: Push
desc: Push an item onto the stack

name: Top
desc: Get the item at the top of the stack

name: Init
desc: {{Internal}} Initialises the AI task. Called by {{LibraryFunction|ai_task|New}}.

name: InitEngine
desc: Initialises the AI task as an engine task.

name: InitFunctionName
desc: Initialises the AI task as NPC method-based.

name: IsEngineType
desc: Determines if the task is an engine task (''TYPE_ENGINE'', 1).

name: IsFNameType
desc: Determines if the task is an NPC method-based task (''TYPE_FNAME'', 2).

name: Run
desc: Runs the AI task.

name: Run_FName
desc: {{Internal}} Runs the AI task as an NPC method. This requires the task to be of type ''TYPE_FNAME''.

name: Start
desc: Starts the AI task.

name: Start_FName
desc: {{Internal}} Starts the AI task as an NPC method.

name: ClearObjects
desc: Clears all objects previously set with {{ClassFunction|Tool|SetObject}}.

name: GetBone
desc: Retrieves a physics bone number previously stored using {{ClassFunction|Tool|SetObject}}.

name: GetClientInfo
desc: Attempts to grab a clientside tool ConVar.

name: GetClientNumber
desc: Attempts to grab a clientside tool ConVar.

name: GetEnt
desc: Retrieves an Entity previously stored using {{ClassFunction|Tool|SetObject}}.

name: GetOperation
desc: Returns the current operation of the tool set by {{ClassFunction|Tool|SetOperation}}.

name: GetServerInfo
desc: Attempts to grab a serverside tool ConVar.

name: GetStage
desc: Returns the current stage of the tool set by {{ClassFunction|Tool|SetStage}}.

name: NumObjects
desc: Returns the amount of stored objects ( Entitys ) the tool has.

name: SetObject
snippet: SetObject(${1:number id},${2:Entity ent},${3:Vector pos},${4:PhysObj phys},${5:number bone},${6:Vector norm})
desc: Stores an Entity for later use in the tool.

name: SetOperation
desc: Sets the current operation of the tool. Does nothing clientside. See also {{ClassFunction|Tool|SetStage}}.

name: SetStage
desc: Sets the current stage of the tool. Does nothing clientside.

name: Add
desc: Adds the values of the second vector to the orignal vector, this function can be used to avoid garbage collection.

name: Angle
desc: Returns an angle representing the normal of the vector.

name: AngleEx
desc: Returns the angle of the vector, but instead of assuming that up is {{GlobalFunction|Vector}}( 0, 0, 1 ) (Like {{ClassFunction|Vector|Angle}} does) you can specify which direction is 'up' for the angle.

name: Cross
desc: Calculates the cross product of this vector and the passed one.

name: Distance
desc: Returns the pythagorean distance between the vector and the other vector.

name: DistToSqr
desc: Returns the squared distance of 2 vectors, this is faster than {{ClassFunction|Vector|Distance}} as calculating the square root is an expensive process.

name: Dot
desc: Returns the [[wikipedia:Dot product#Geometric definition|dot product]] of this vector and the passed one.

name: DotProduct
desc: {{Deprecated|This is an alias of {{ClassFunction|Vector|Dot}}. Use that instead.}}Returns the dot product of the two vectors.

name: GetNormalized
desc: Returns a normalized version of the vector. Normalized means vector with same direction but with length of 1.

name: IsEqualTol
desc: Returns if the vector is equal to another vector with the given tolerance.

name: Length
desc: Returns the Euclidean length of the vector: √ x² + y² + z²

name: Length2D
desc: Returns the length of the vector in two dimensions, without the Z axis.

name: Length2DSqr
desc: Returns the squared length of the vectors x and y value, x² + y².

name: LengthSqr
desc: Returns the squared length of the vector, x² + y² + z².

name: Mul
desc: Scales the vector by the given number, that means x, y and z are multiplied by that value.

name: Rotate
desc: Rotates a vector by the given angle.

name: Set
desc: Copies the values from the second vector to the first vector.

name: Sub
desc: Substracts the values of the second vector from the orignal vector, this function can be used to avoid garbage collection.

name: ToColor
desc: Translates the vector normalized vector ( length is 1 ) into a {{Struct|Color}}.

name: ToScreen
desc: Translates the vectors position into 2D user screen coordinates.

name: WithinAABox
desc: Returns whenever the given vector is in a box created by the 2 other vectors.

name: BoostTimeLeft
desc: Returns the remaining boosting time left.

name: EnableEngine
desc: Sets whether the engine is enabled or disabled, i.e. can be started or not.

name: GetAmmo
desc: Returns information about the ammo of the vehicle

name: GetCameraDistance
desc: Returns third person camera distance.

name: GetDriver
desc: Gets the driver of the vehicle, returns NULL if no driver is present.

name: GetHLSpeed
desc: Returns the current speed of the vehicle in Half-Life Hammer Units (in/s). Same as {{ClassFunction|Entity|GetVelocity}} + {{ClassFunction|Vector|Length}}.

name: GetOperatingParams
desc: Returns some info about the vehicle.

name: GetPassenger
desc: Gets the passenger of the vehicle, returns NULL if no drivers is present.

name: GetPassengerSeatPoint
desc: Returns the seat position and angle of a given passenger seat.

name: GetRPM
desc: Returns the current RPM of the vehicle. This value is fake and doesn't actually affect the vehicle movement.

name: GetSpeed
desc: Returns the current speed of the vehicle in MPH.

name: GetSteering
desc: Returns the current steering of the vehicle.

name: GetSteeringDegrees
desc: Returns the maximum steering degree of the vehicle

name: GetThirdPersonMode
desc: Returns if vehicle has thirdperson mode enabled or not.

name: GetThrottle
desc: Returns the current throttle of the vehicle.

name: GetVehicleClass
desc: Returns the vehicle class name. This is only useful for Sandbox spawned vehicles or any vehicle that properly sets the vehicle class with {{ClassFunction|Vehicle|SetVehicleClass}}.

name: GetVehicleParams
desc: Returns the vehicle parameters of given vehicle.

name: GetVehicleViewPosition
desc: Returns the view position and forward angle of a given passenger seat.

name: GetWheel
desc: Returns the PhysObj of given wheel.

name: GetWheelBaseHeight
desc: Returns the base wheel height.

name: GetWheelContactPoint
desc: Returns the wheel contact point.

name: GetWheelCount
desc: Returns the wheel count of the vehicle

name: GetWheelTotalHeight
desc: Returns the total wheel height.

name: HasBoost
desc: Returns whether this vehicle has boost at all.

name: HasBrakePedal
